original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The this is what is to be explained.

original: gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The seed of all the Mohavajra Yamantakas, etc., is the cause of generation.

original: des par phyung ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par spros pa'o //
analyzed: des par phyung ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par spros pa'o //
translated: The extraction is the emanation.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug nas zhal du bcug ste thugs su bzhus nas rdo rje'i lam nas phyung zhing nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes su zla ba zhu bar gyur pa las byung ba'i ya las
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug nas zhal du bcug ste thugs su bzhus nas rdo rje'i lam nas phyung zhing nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes su zla ba zhu bar gyur pa las byung ba'i ya las
translated: This is taught: Light from your heart summons the Tathagatas, who enter your mouth, melt into your heart, and emerge from your vajra path. They arise from the moon that has melted in the lotus that is similar to you.

original: gzhal yas khang sprul bar mdzad de 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas der nyi ma dang zla ba la sa bon bcu bdun dgod bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang sprul bar mdzad de 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas der nyi ma dang zla ba la sa bon bcu bdun dgod bar bya ba yin no //
translated: From the syllable ya, you emanate the celestial mansion. In this place, as will be explained, you should place the seventeen seed syllables on the sun and moon.

original: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs pa ni ma yin no zhes la la 'dod do //
analyzed: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs pa ni ma yin no zhes la la 'dod do //
translated: Here, some assert that the Bhagavat does not enter meditative equipoise.

original: de'i lugs ltar na //
analyzed: de'i lugs ltar na //
translated: According to their system,

original: bha gar ling+ga rnam bsgom nyid //
analyzed: bha gar ling+ga rnam bsgom nyid //
translated: Meditate on the liṅga in the bhaga,

original: dkyil 'khor bdag por rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bdag por rnam par bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the lord of the maṇḍala.

original: zhes rim par phye ba bcu pa las bstan pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes rim par phye ba bcu pa las bstan pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This would contradict the teaching in the tenth chapter.

original: gzhan yang nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes su dkyil 'khor bskyed nas 'byin par byed pa yang snyoms par 'jug pa med na ji ltar der 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes su dkyil 'khor bskyed nas 'byin par byed pa yang snyoms par 'jug pa med na ji ltar der 'gyur //
translated: Moreover, if there is no meditative union, how could one generate a mandala in a lotus like oneself and emit it?

original: 'on te de med du zad mod ce na /
analyzed: 'on te de med du zad mod ce na /
translated: If you say that it is just so,

original: de ltar na ni 'byin pa'i sngags dgos pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na ni 'byin pa'i sngags dgos pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the purpose of the emission mantra would be pointless.

original: 'on te sngags nyid kyis rang gi snying ga nas spro bar bya'o zhe na de ltar @87b na ni sa bon dgod pa'i don ci yin /
analyzed: 'on te sngags nyid kyis rang gi snying ga nas spro bar bya'o zhe na de ltar @87b na ni sa bon dgod pa'i don ci yin /
translated: If you say that it should be emitted from one’s heart by the mantra itself, then what is the purpose of the seed syllable?

original: sa bon las bskyed nas gnas ji lta bar 'byin par byed cing dgod par bya bar ni grags so //
analyzed: sa bon las bskyed nas gnas ji lta bar 'byin par byed cing dgod par bya bar ni grags so //
translated: It is well known that one generates from the seed syllable and emits it in its proper place.

original: gang gi tshe dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du sa bon las rdzogs par gyur na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du sa bon las rdzogs par gyur na /
translated: When it is complete from the seed syllable in the commitment maṇḍala,

original: de'i tshe de ltar phyung nas gang du khyer bar byed de de'i phyir nges pa kho nar gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du sa bon dang phyag mtshan gyi rim gyis lha'i 'khor lo ma lus pa sprul la phyung nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du rna par gzhag par
analyzed: de'i tshe de ltar phyung nas gang du khyer bar byed de de'i phyir nges pa kho nar gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du sa bon dang phyag mtshan gyi rim gyis lha'i 'khor lo ma lus pa sprul la phyung nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du rna par gzhag par
translated: At that time, having thus emanated, where would one take it? Therefore, it is certain that one should emanate the entire circle of deities by means of the seed and insignia stages in the secret mandala, and having emanated, one should place it in the pledge mandala.

original: bya'o zhes bya bas chog gi mang du smra ci dgos /
analyzed: bya'o zhes bya bas chog gi mang du smra ci dgos /
translated: What is the use of saying much?

original: ra sogs yi ge dang po ni ya'o //
analyzed: ra sogs yi ge dang po ni ya'o //
translated: The first letter of ra and so forth is ya.

original: de ni gshin rje gshed du 'gyur ba ste 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de ni gshin rje gshed du 'gyur ba ste 'byung ba'o //
translated: That becomes Yamāntaka, that is, it arises.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽yi ge kshe ni gti mug brjod //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las zhes bya ba'i don to // yi ge kshe ni gti mug brjod //
translated: The meaning is that it is transformed.🔽The letter kṣe is said to be delusion.

original: ces bya ba la yi ge kshe gyur pa las gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed du bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba la yi ge kshe gyur pa las gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed du bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the letter kṣe becomes Delusion Vajra Yamāntaka.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag bskyed pa yang rang rang gi sa bon du gyur pa las rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag bskyed pa yang rang rang gi sa bon du gyur pa las rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should generate the others from their own seed syllables.

original: nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes su gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni rigs so //
analyzed: nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes su gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni rigs so //
translated: It is appropriate to generate the celestial mansion in the lotus that is similar to oneself.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba /
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba /
translated: The vajra cross is terrifying.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha' ni nam mkha'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha' ni nam mkha'o //
translated: In the sky vajra, etc. , the sky is space.

original: de nyid brtags pa ma lus pa zad par byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid brtags pa ma lus pa zad par byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
translated: It is a vajra because it is the cause for the termination of all conceptualization and because it is indivisible.

original: chos kyi brdas ni nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yang yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi brdas ni nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yang yin no //
translated: It is also a seal that generates the dharma that is similar to oneself by the convention of the dharma.

original: de'i dkyil du ste nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes kyi lte ba'i ngo bo sna tshogs padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du zla ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi gzugs der bsam pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dkyil du ste nyid dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes kyi lte ba'i ngo bo sna tshogs padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du zla ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi gzugs der bsam pa ste /
translated: In the middle of that, in the middle of the lotus that is similar to oneself, one should imagine the form of the celestial mansion situated on the moon on the vajra cross,

original: sna tshogs rdo rje ni sna tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje ni sna tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the vajra cross is the nature of the variety.

original: 'di'i kha dog gi khyad par ni bcu bzhi pa las bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i kha dog gi khyad par ni bcu bzhi pa las bstan par bya'o //
translated: The special color of this will be explained in the fourteenth chapter.

original: de'i dkyil du gshin rje gshed bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dkyil du gshin rje gshed bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the center of that one should meditate on Yamântaka.

original: shar du zhes bya ba ni rtsibs kyi rtsa bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shar du zhes bya ba ni rtsibs kyi rtsa bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the east means at the base of the spoke.

original: gzhan du yang de bzhin no //🔽mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la /
analyzed: gzhan du yang de bzhin no // mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la /
translated: The same in the other directions.🔽In the four corners, on the points of the vajra

original: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means in the four corners of the variegated vajra.

original: sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la //
analyzed: sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la //
translated: In the four doors, on the points of the vajra

original: zhes bya ba ni sgor byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo la'o //🔽sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgor byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo la'o // sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru //
translated: means on the points of the variegated vajra that emerges in the doors.🔽In the four corners of the variegated vajra

original: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: means in the four corners of the maṇḍala of the variegated vajra.

original: da ni de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'byin pa'i sngags @88a * //🔽gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: da ni de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'byin pa'i sngags @88a * // gsungs pa ni /
translated: Now, then, the mantra of emission is stated by Then the Lord, all tathāgatas, and so on.

original: aom hr'i: shtri: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar rigs pa'o //
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar rigs pa'o //
translated: Om hrīḥ śrīḥ, and so on, as appropriate.

original: gshin rje gshed nyid du rigs gcig pa'i phyir thams cad gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nyid du rigs gcig pa'i phyir thams cad gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su gdon par bya'o //
translated: Since all are of the same class as Yamântaka, they should all be visualized in the form of Yamântaka.

original: spro ba yang bcu pa las /
analyzed: spro ba yang bcu pa las /
translated: As for the emanation, the Ten-Line [Praise of Mañjuśrī] states:

original: ba spu'i khung nas spro bar bya //
analyzed: ba spu'i khung nas spro bar bya //
translated: Emanate from the pores.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: And so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One's mantra for the consecration of the body, speech, and mind of the complete maṇḍala is stated from Then and so forth.

original: sku dan gsung dang thugs ni aom a'a: h'um las skyes pa'i 'khor lo dang padma dang rdo rje'i dkyil na bzhugs pa'i lha'i gzugs te ;
analyzed: sku dan gsung dang thugs ni aom a'a: h'um las skyes pa'i 'khor lo dang padma dang rdo rje'i dkyil na bzhugs pa'i lha'i gzugs te ;
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the forms of the deities residing in the centers of the wheel, lotus, and vajra born from Oṃ, Āḥ, and Hūṃ.

original: sngags 'di rnams kyis byin gyis brlab po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngags 'di rnams kyis byin gyis brlab po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they should be consecrated with these mantras.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bskyed zin pa'i mdog dang zhal dang phyag mtshan bstan to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bskyed zin pa'i mdog dang zhal dang phyag mtshan bstan to //
translated: Then and so forth indicates the colors, faces, and hand implements of the generated [deities].

original: zhi ba la zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs ba'i las bzhi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba la zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs ba'i las bzhi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The peaceful is so called because it performs the four actions such as pacifying.

original: gsal ba'i gzugs ni zla ba'i gzugs so //
analyzed: gsal ba'i gzugs ni zla ba'i gzugs so //
translated: The luminous form is the form of the moon.

original: gang gi gzugs de dang 'dra bar 'od gsal ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi gzugs de dang 'dra bar 'od gsal ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cause of the light that is like that form is called luminous.

original: rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'i las la'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'i las la'o //
translated: The prosperous is so called because it performs the action of prosperity.

original: gser gyi rnam pa'i zhes bya ba ni ser po'o //
analyzed: gser gyi rnam pa'i zhes bya ba ni ser po'o //
translated: The golden form is the yellow.

original: dbang byed pa zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba'i las la'o //🔽padma r'a ga ni rin po che'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: dbang byed pa zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba'i las la'o // padma r'a ga ni rin po che'i khyad par ro //
translated: The powerful is so called because it performs the action of subjugation.🔽Padmaraga is a special jewel.

original: rin chen margad 'od dang ldan //🔽zhes bya ba ni ljang gu ste /
analyzed: rin chen margad 'od dang ldan // zhes bya ba ni ljang gu ste /
translated: The emerald jewel is the green.

original: rin po che margad dang 'dra ba'i 'od can no //
analyzed: rin po che margad dang 'dra ba'i 'od can no //
translated: It has the light of an emerald jewel.

original: shugs can zhes bya ba ni ral gri'o //
analyzed: shugs can zhes bya ba ni ral gri'o //
translated: Powerful is the sword.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid ni gshin rje gshed nag po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid ni gshin rje gshed nag po'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of all tathagatas is indeed the black Yamari.

original: de rgyas par ston par byed pa de la yang de skad ces bstan to //
analyzed: de rgyas par ston par byed pa de la yang de skad ces bstan to //
translated: The one who reveals that extensively is also called that.

original: mngon par ni dngos po kun gyis so //
analyzed: mngon par ni dngos po kun gyis so //
translated: manifested means by all things.

original: rtogs pa ni mngon sum du ngo bo nyid gang gis thob pa ste de ni mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni mngon sum du ngo bo nyid gang gis thob pa ste de ni mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: Realization is the attainment of the nature of direct perception, and that is the realization.

original: mi shes pa thams cad mi snang bar byed pas gos dang 'dra ba'i phyir rim pa'o //
analyzed: mi shes pa thams cad mi snang bar byed pas gos dang 'dra ba'i phyir rim pa'o //
translated: The stages are like garments because they make all ignorance invisible.

original: de len cing 'dzin par byed pas de nyid ni rim par phye ba yang yin pas mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pas phye ba ste gnyis pa la ltos nas dang po'o //
analyzed: de len cing 'dzin par byed pas de nyid ni rim par phye ba yang yin pas mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pas phye ba ste gnyis pa la ltos nas dang po'o //
translated: Since it takes and holds that, it is the stages, and since it is also the divisions, it is the stages of realization, and it is the first in relation to the second.

original: rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni lhag ma med pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni lhag ma med pa'o //
translated: It is complete means without remainder.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba dang po'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba dang po'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the first chapter of the Sri-Krsnayamaripañjikd composed by Acarya Sridhara.

original: // / da ni sems can rnams dbang bskur ba la sogs pas snod du bsgrubs nas gsang ba bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba yin la @88b de yang sngon du dkyil 'khor 'gro ba yin no zhes bya bas las dang po'i rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor bri ba gsungs🔽pa yin no //
analyzed: // / da ni sems can rnams dbang bskur ba la sogs pas snod du bsgrubs nas gsang ba bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba yin la @88b de yang sngon du dkyil 'khor 'gro ba yin no zhes bya bas las dang po'i rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor bri ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the drawing of the mandala by the beginner yogin is taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams sdud pa po nyid yin pas chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams sdud pa po nyid yin pas chen po'o //
translated: Great Vajrasattva is great because of being the collector of the migrating beings.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas rdo rje'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas rdo rje'o //
translated: He is a vajra because of being the essence of the Thought of Enlightenment.🔽And that is stated in the Hevajra Tantra:

original: de yang / byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //🔽zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: de yang / byang chub sems gang de rdo rje // zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: That which is the Thought of Enlightenment is a vajra.

original: gang la de la sems pa yod pa de la bstod pa zhes bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yon tan dam pas bstod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang la de la sems pa yod pa de la bstod pa zhes bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yon tan dam pas bstod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He who has that thought is praised with the praise of the sublime qualities to be explained, called “praise.”

original: chos thams cad la rtogs pa med pa ni gti mug go //
analyzed: chos thams cad la rtogs pa med pa ni gti mug go //
translated: Delusion is the non-realization of all things.

original: de nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis mi phyed pa'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis mi phyed pa'i rdo rje ste /
translated: That is a vajra because it is indivisible by nature as the mirror-like pristine consciousness.

original: gang la de'i ngo bo yod pa de ni de nyid do //
analyzed: gang la de'i ngo bo yod pa de ni de nyid do //
translated: That which has that nature is that itself.

original: gshin rje gshed nag po ni bstan zin to //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po ni bstan zin to //
translated: Black Yamantaka has already been explained.

original: rab 'jigs par zhes bya ba ni rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: rab 'jigs par zhes bya ba ni rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
translated: Very frightening is the discordant class.

original: 'di yang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yin pas sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin no ;
analyzed: 'di yang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yin pas sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin no ;
translated: This also is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses, the nature of all buddhas.

original: / gang gi gdul bya rnams la ston cing phan pa la sbyor bar byed pas ston pa'o //
analyzed: / gang gi gdul bya rnams la ston cing phan pa la sbyor bar byed pas ston pa'o //
translated: Since it is displayed to those to be tamed and applied to benefit, it is the teacher.

original: rdo rje sku zhes bya ba la mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad kyis mi 'jigs shing mi phyed pa'i ye shes lnga'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sku zhes bya ba la mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad kyis mi 'jigs shing mi phyed pa'i ye shes lnga'o //
translated: The vajra body is the five pristine consciousnesses that are indestructible and indivisible by all discordant classes.

original: de ltar bos nas phyag 'tshal zhing bstod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar bos nas phyag 'tshal zhing bstod pa'o //
translated: Having addressed that, it is the homage and praise.

original: yang na gshin rje zhes bya ba nas bstod ba la thugs pa'i tshig lngas gshin rje gshed lnga bstan to //
analyzed: yang na gshin rje zhes bya ba nas bstod ba la thugs pa'i tshig lngas gshin rje gshed lnga bstan to //
translated: Alternatively, the five lines from Yamantaka to praise explain the five Yamantakas.

original: rdo rje sku la zhes bya ba gcig pus ni dbye ba ma byas pa'i rdo rje 'chang ste ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sku la zhes bya ba gcig pus ni dbye ba ma byas pa'i rdo rje 'chang ste ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase in the vajra body refers to Vajradhara without differentiation, and should be applied as appropriate.

original: de bzhin du phra ma rdo rje la sogs pa la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du phra ma rdo rje la sogs pa la yang sbyar ro //
translated: Similarly, it should be applied to vajra speech and so on.

original: 'dis ni ma 'ongs pa'i slob dpon rnams kyis kyang gsol ba gdab pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni ma 'ongs pa'i slob dpon rnams kyis kyang gsol ba gdab pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that even future masters should draw the maṇḍala preceded by supplicating.

original: mchod pa'i rjes thogs su bstod pa yang bya ba'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rjes thogs su bstod pa yang bya ba'o //
translated: After the offerings, one should also praise.

original: da ni rnal 'byor chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to complete the great yoga, the consecration of the eyes and so on is taught.

original: rdo rje mig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje mig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: With the vajra eyes, etc.

original: gang gis rdo rje ltar mi phyed cing mi shigs pa'i mig sgrub par byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis rdo rje ltar mi phyed cing mi shigs pa'i mig sgrub par byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which accomplishes the eyes that are indivisible and indestructible like a vajra is called that.

original: de ltar gzhan la yang go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan zin pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan la yang go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan zin pa'o //
translated: It is said that it should be understood similarly for others, which has been explained.

original: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa ni rdo rje mig la sogs pa lha'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa ni rdo rje mig la sogs pa lha'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
translated: The consecration of the eye, etc. is the perfect accomplishment of the eye, etc. of the deity, which is the nature of the vajra.

original: 'thob par byed pa gang yin pa ni rdo rje mig la sogs pa @89a * //
analyzed: 'thob par byed pa gang yin pa ni rdo rje mig la sogs pa @89a * //
translated: That which is to be attained is the eye, etc. of the vajra.

original: ni byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: ni byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of consecration.

original: 'di rnams rdo rje ste dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: 'di rnams rdo rje ste dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: These are vajras, because of the manner of their indivisibility.

original: dam tshig sgrub par byed pa ni 'dir ma bstan to //
analyzed: dam tshig sgrub par byed pa ni 'dir ma bstan to //
translated: The accomplishment of the pledge is not taught here.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dkyil 'khor bri ba bstan to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dkyil 'khor bri ba bstan to //
translated: Then, etc. teaches the drawing of the mandala.

original: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni drag po'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni drag po'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Fearful means having a fierce form.

original: / dkyil 'khor ni byang chub kyi sems ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: / dkyil 'khor ni byang chub kyi sems ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The mandala is the essence of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: de yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las //
analyzed: de yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las //
translated: And that is said in the glorious Guhyasamaja:

original: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The mandala of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: gshin rje gshed po nyid mtshungs pa //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed po nyid mtshungs pa //
translated: Yamari is similar.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means “like.”

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyi byang chub kyi gzugs can yin pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyi byang chub kyi gzugs can yin pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as the Blessed One is the form of enlightenment, which is the nature of emptiness and compassion, so too is the maṇḍala.

original: 'dod pa'i don kun ni 'dod par bya ba lnga po gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun ni 'dod par bya ba lnga po gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: All desired aims are the five objects of desire, such as form, and so on.

original: des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the means of accomplishing the aim of perfect enlightenment.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po bsgoms pas mngon sum du byed pas 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po bsgoms pas mngon sum du byed pas 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Since one actualizes the glorious Black Slayer of the Lord of Death through meditation, it accomplishes all desired aims.

original: thig gdab pa gsungs pa la sar pa zhes bya ba ni ma spyad pa'o //
analyzed: thig gdab pa gsungs pa la sar pa zhes bya ba ni ma spyad pa'o //
translated: With regard to the statement about the layout, “fresh” means unused.

original: legs bsgril ba zhes bya ba ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba las skud pa lnga'i bdag nyid du bsgril ba'o //🔽legs ba'i tshad la zhes bya ba ni sgo'i nyi shu char sbom pa /
analyzed: legs bsgril ba zhes bya ba ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba las skud pa lnga'i bdag nyid du bsgril ba'o // legs ba'i tshad la zhes bya ba ni sgo'i nyi shu char sbom pa /
translated: “Well-spun” means spun from the division of twenty-five [strands] into the nature of five strands.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyi tshad du ring ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyi tshad du ring ba'o //
translated: “The right size” means thick as a quarter of the door and long as twice the maṇḍala.

original: mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni dri zhim po lnga dang bdud rtsi lngas spangs pa rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhug pas ye shes kyi skud par byas pas thig gdab bo zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni dri zhim po lnga dang bdud rtsi lngas spangs pa rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhug pas ye shes kyi skud par byas pas thig gdab bo zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: The beautiful is the five sweet substances and the five nectars, and the form of one's own deity is the mandala of gnosis, and by inserting it, it is made into the thread of gnosis, and one should draw the lines.

original: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa la sogs pa la gzo ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa la sogs pa la gzo ba'o //
translated: The wise are those skilled in drawing the mandala lines, etc.

original: cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bsgrubs so //
analyzed: cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bsgrubs so //
translated: The rite is the extensive accomplishment of the mandala rite.

original: mtshan nyid thams cad rab rdzogs shing //
analyzed: mtshan nyid thams cad rab rdzogs shing //
translated: Having all the characteristics completely perfect,

original: zhes bya ba gru bzhi pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gru bzhi pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
translated: means having the characteristics of a square, etc.

original: bar chad thams cad rab mnyam pa //
analyzed: bar chad thams cad rab mnyam pa //
translated: Having all obstacles completely pacified,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bar chad thams cad rnam par nyams pa'o //🔽zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bar chad thams cad rnam par nyams pa'o // zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa //
translated: means having completely destroyed all obstacles of afflictions such as desire, etc.🔽Engaging in pacification, etc.,

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las byed pa'o //
translated: means performing the activities of pacification, increase, etc.

original: dkyil 'khor nyid gang la byang chub kyi sems kyi cha byad dang 'dra ba yod pa bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor nyid gang la byang chub kyi sems kyi cha byad dang 'dra ba yod pa bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: The mandala itself should be drawn with the form of the bodhicitta.

original: 'dis ni phyi rol nyid kyi @89b rtog pa spong bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dis ni phyi rol nyid kyi @89b rtog pa spong bar byed do //
translated: This eliminates the idea of the external.

original: las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
translated: The karma-vajra is the crossed vajra.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bri bar bya'o //
translated: On that, in the center of the mandala, one should draw.

original: rtse mo lnga dang mnyam ldan pa //
analyzed: rtse mo lnga dang mnyam ldan pa //
translated: Having five points,

original: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhir ro //
translated: means in the four directions.🔽That,

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
translated: means the crossed vajra.🔽In the center,

original: dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi gnas su rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga kha gyes pa mdzes pa bri zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi gnas su rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga kha gyes pa mdzes pa bri zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means in the center of the mandala, one should draw a beautiful five-pointed blue vajra. This is the meaning.

original: rdo rje 'bar bas 'khrigs pa yi //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar bas 'khrigs pa yi //
translated: Surrounded by blazing vajras,

original: zhes bya ba ni dbyer med pa'i 'od kyis bskor bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbyer med pa'i 'od kyis bskor bas so //
translated: means surrounded by inseparable light.🔽On the eastern spoke,

original: shar gyi rtsibs la zhes bya ba ni shar gyi rtsibs kyi rtsa bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shar gyi rtsibs la zhes bya ba ni shar gyi rtsibs kyi rtsa bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means at the base of the eastern spoke. This is the meaning.

original: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po'o //🔽'khor lo'i 'od kyis 'khrigs bskor ba ;
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po'o // 'khor lo'i 'od kyis 'khrigs bskor ba ;
translated: The “wheel” is a white one with eight spokes.

original: / zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i rnam pa can gyi 'od kyis kun tu bskor ba'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i rnam pa can gyi 'od kyis kun tu bskor ba'o //
translated: “Surrounded by the light of the wheel” means surrounded by light in the form of a wheel.

original: de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyi rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la ni rin po che dang padma dang ral gri'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyi rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la ni rin po che dang padma dang ral gri'o //
translated: Similarly, at the base of the spokes in the south, west, and north are a jewel, a lotus, and a sword.

original: shar gyi mtshams su zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i me'i mtshams su zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shar gyi mtshams su zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i me'i mtshams su zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “In the east” means in the southeast of the center of the crossed vajra.

original: de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang gi mtshams rnams su ni rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang gi mtshams rnams su ni rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: Similarly, in the south, west, and north are a vajra and so forth.

original: de bzhin du tho ba dang dbyug pa dang 'dam skyes dang ral gri rnams shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tho ba dang dbyug pa dang 'dam skyes dang ral gri rnams shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su bri bar bya'o //
translated: Similarly, a hammer, a club, a lotus, and a sword are drawn in the east and so forth.

original: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pas bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pas bskyed pa ste /
translated: “Complete” means generated by the process of accomplishing the maṇḍala.

original: de ni bcu bzhi pa la 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni bcu bzhi pa la 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That will be explained in chapter fourteen.

original: the tshom med par zhes bya ba ni mchod bya dang mchod pa po dang mchod pa dbyer med pa'i blos so //
analyzed: the tshom med par zhes bya ba ni mchod bya dang mchod pa po dang mchod pa dbyer med pa'i blos so //
translated: Without doubt means with a mind that is inseparable from the object of worship, the worshipper, and the worship.

original: rim par phye ba gang gi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub par byed pa'i rim par phye ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rim par phye ba gang gi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub par byed pa'i rim par phye ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The chapter is so called because it is the chapter that accomplishes the great maṇḍala of the one who is divided into stages.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the second chapter in the Śrī-Vajravidāraṇa-nāma-mahāvaipūlya-tantra composed by the master Śrīdhara.🔽The second chapter is concluded.

original: // / gsol ba ma btab par dkyil 'khor bri bar mi bya'o zhes ma 'ongs pa'i slob dpon rnams la bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / gsol ba ma btab par dkyil 'khor bri bar mi bya'o zhes ma 'ongs pa'i slob dpon rnams la bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The maṇḍala should not be drawn without being requested is taught for future masters.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to request the tathāgatas, it is said then and so on.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of colored powders.

original: sdig pa thams cad de des skyes zin pa'i srog gcod pa la sogs pa rnams 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad de des skyes zin pa'i srog gcod pa la sogs pa rnams 'joms pa'o //
translated: All sins are destroyed by it, having already arisen, such as killing and so on.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rgyud gzhan sgrub pa yang len cing bsgrubs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rgyud gzhan sgrub pa yang len cing bsgrubs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo'o //
translated: Since he takes up and accomplishes all mandalas, he is the chief of all mandalas.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /🔽'dir dbang bskur @90a * //
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te / 'dir dbang bskur @90a * //
translated: This is taught as follows:

original: ba thob pa'i bsgom pa pos ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ba thob pa'i bsgom pa pos ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
translated: Here, the meditator who has received initiation will attain the intuition of all mandalas.

original: rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to complete the great yoga, he declares:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: rdo rje 'dzin chen po ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin chen po ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
translated: The great vajra-holder is the five Tathagatas, who are the nature of the five intuitions.

original: de de'i bdag nyid du 'dzin par mdzad pas rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: de de'i bdag nyid du 'dzin par mdzad pas rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: He is the great vajra-holder, since he holds them in his nature.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra of the spirit of enlightenment is the spirit of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bdud rtsi gang gis myong bar byed cing de nyid kyis dbang du byed pa ni de ni mi 'da' bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir dam tshig go //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bdud rtsi gang gis myong bar byed cing de nyid kyis dbang du byed pa ni de ni mi 'da' bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge is that which is experienced by the nectar of the vajra of the spirit of enlightenment, and by that very thing he is brought under control, because he is not to be transgressed.

original: nges par phyung ba zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid du spros pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nges par phyung ba zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid du spros pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The definite extraction is the elaboration of its nature.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He states just that:

original: aom a'a: h'um chos thams cad dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni aa /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um chos thams cad dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni aa /
translated: Om, A, HuM. All phenomena are unreal.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir te des na au'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir te des na au'o //
translated: Why? Because they are free from arising. Therefore, Au.

original: gnas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnas pa gsungs pa /
translated: He states the abiding:

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i zhes bya bas ma'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i zhes bya bas ma'o //
translated: Like an illusion. Therefore, Ma.

original: 'di dag bsdus pa ni aom mo //
analyzed: 'di dag bsdus pa ni aom mo //
translated: These are condensed in Om.

original: chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba aa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba aa ste /
translated: All phenomena are primordially unborn. Therefore, A.

original: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of signless.

original: gnas pa gsungs pa dngos po dang bral ba las dngos po dang bral ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya bas a'a:'o //
analyzed: gnas pa gsungs pa dngos po dang bral ba las dngos po dang bral ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya bas a'a:'o //
translated: He states the abiding: From the separation of entities, the phenomena of separation arise. Therefore, A.

original: chos thams cad nyams pa med do zhes bya bas ha'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad nyams pa med do zhes bya bas ha'o //
translated: All phenomena are undiminished. Therefore, Ha.

original: chos thams cad rtog pa dang bral bas au'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad rtog pa dang bral bas au'o //
translated: All phenomena are free from conceptualization. Therefore, Au.

original: de nyid kyis smon pa med pas sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya bas ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis smon pa med pas sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya bas ma'o //
translated: Since they are just that, they are wishless. Therefore, Ma.

original: de rnams bsdus pa ni h'um ngo //
analyzed: de rnams bsdus pa ni h'um ngo //
translated: The essence of those is the syllable hūṃ.

original: yang bdud rtsi ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: yang bdud rtsi ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
translated: Again, nectar is the five nectars.

original: de myang ba ni nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de myang ba ni nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: To drink is to enjoy.

original: de'i don gyis dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i sngags kyi gzugs so //
analyzed: de'i don gyis dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i sngags kyi gzugs so //
translated: The pledge by the meaning of that is the mantra form not to be transgressed.

original: nges par phyung zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bstan pa ste /
analyzed: nges par phyung zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bstan pa ste /
translated: To bring out is to teach clearly.

original: aom a'a: h'um 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is taught by the syllables oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: 'dis bdud rtsi lnga mngon par bsngags la myang bar bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis bdud rtsi lnga mngon par bsngags la myang bar bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This means that one should drink the five nectars consecrated by those syllables.

original: myang ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: myang ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: The ritual of drinking is stated:

original: rdo rje lce'i zhes bya ba la lce nyid rdo rje ste man ngag gis h'um las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lce'i zhes bya ba la lce nyid rdo rje ste man ngag gis h'um las skyes pa'o //
translated: The vajra tongue, the tongue itself is a vajra, born from the esoteric hūṃ.

original: de'i khyad par can gyi sbyor ba ni sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i khyad par can gyi sbyor ba ni sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The special application of that is by the application,

original: 'od zer sbu gu 'dra ba'i rdo rje lce'i sbyor ba des so //
analyzed: 'od zer sbu gu 'dra ba'i rdo rje lce'i sbyor ba des so //
translated: by the application of the vajra tongue like a tube of light rays.

original: rdo rje can kun zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: rdo rje can kun zhes bya ba la //
translated: All vajrī means all buddhas.

original: rdo rje ni me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba nan tan dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba nan tan dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The vajra is the mirror-like wisdom, the wisdom of equality, the wisdom of individual realization, the wisdom of performing action, and the wisdom of the extremely pure sphere of reality.🔽And in the glorious Guhyasamaja,

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang /
translated: it is said:

original: shes dang shes bya lnga nyid ni //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya lnga nyid ni //
translated: The five of the knower and the known

original: rdo rje zhes ni brjod pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs @90b pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes ni brjod pa yin // zhes gsungs @90b pa yin no //
translated: are called the vajra.

original: rdo rje can gang la de yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: rdo rje can gang la de yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: The one who has the vajra is the nature of the five transcendent lords' wisdoms.

original: de ni kun yang yin la rdo rje can yin pas rdo rje can kun te de rnams so //
analyzed: de ni kun yang yin la rdo rje can yin pas rdo rje can kun te de rnams so //
translated: He is also all and has the vajra, so he is the vajra-holder, and he is all of them.

original: kun zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de'i rigs rnams kyang bsdu'o //
analyzed: kun zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de'i rigs rnams kyang bsdu'o //
translated: The word all includes their families.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad bstan pa yin te 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa na bzhugs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bdag gi lus la bcug la bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad bstan pa yin te 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa na bzhugs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bdag gi lus la bcug la bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This teaches that one should imagine that all the buddhas together with their retinues dwelling in the three worlds have entered one's body and are enjoying the nectar.

original: bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa //
analyzed: bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa //
translated: The method of accomplishing nectar🔽is said to be the entry of all perfect Buddhas.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug / ces bya ba ni rlung dang me la gnas pa'i snod du bi mu ma ra su dang / da ha na go ku rnams rdo rje dang bcas pa zhu bar byas la aom gyi 'od kyis dgug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug / ces bya ba ni rlung dang me la gnas pa'i snod du bi mu ma ra su dang / da ha na go ku rnams rdo rje dang bcas pa zhu bar byas la aom gyi 'od kyis dgug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that in a vessel situated on wind and fire, the bīja of Vairocana, and the bīja of Akṣobhya, along with the vajra, are melted by the light of the syllable Oṃ, and are drawn in.

original: ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi ngo bos zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi ngo bos zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The “source of intuition” means the nature of intuition.🔽Having generated the commitment wheel, how is the intuition wheel caused to enter?

original: dam tshig gi 'khor lo bskyed nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo ji ltar gzhug par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: dam tshig gi 'khor lo bskyed nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo ji ltar gzhug par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ste ngo bo nyid ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i ngo bo ji lta ba'i gzugs des zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽dgug pa dang zhes bya ba ni dgug pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ste ngo bo nyid ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i ngo bo ji lta ba'i gzugs des zhes bya ba'i don to // dgug pa dang zhes bya ba ni dgug pa'o //
translated: “by its own nature,” meaning that by the form just like the nature of the commitment wheel, is the meaning.🔽“Summoning” means summoning.

original: gzhug dang zhes bya ba ni rab tu gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: gzhug dang zhes bya ba ni rab tu gzhug pa'o //
translated: “Causing to enter” means causing to enter.

original: bcings ba dang zhes bya ba ni yid mi g-yo bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcings ba dang zhes bya ba ni yid mi g-yo bar bya ba'o //
translated: “Binding” means causing the mind to be unmoving.

original: dbang du bya zhes bya ba ni dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang du bya zhes bya ba ni dga' bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase one should bring under one's control means one should delight.🔽How should one do this?

original: 'di dag ji ltar bya ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di dag ji ltar bya ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is stated:

original: tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis //🔽zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis // zhes bya bas so //
translated: With the four mantras of the hammer, etc.

original: tho ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: tho ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The hammer, etc.

original: tho ba dang dbyug pa dang padma dang ral gri gshin rje gshed bzhi'i sngags bzhis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tho ba dang dbyug pa dang padma dang ral gri gshin rje gshed bzhi'i sngags bzhis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is with the four mantras of the four Yamântakas, the hammer, the club, the lotus, and the sword.

original: de yang rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa las go bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa las go bar bya'o //
translated: And that should be understood from the thirteenth chapter.🔽The meditation on the principal deity of the mandala is stated:

original: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bsgom pa gsungs pa ma he rdo rje zhes bya ba la ma hi rsha ni ma he'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bsgom pa gsungs pa ma he rdo rje zhes bya ba la ma hi rsha ni ma he'o //
translated: The bull-vajra,

original: de'i rgyab tu ni rdo rje ste /🔽ya las rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu ni rdo rje ste / ya las rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: on whose back is the vajra,🔽is perfected from ya.

original: rnam bsgom zhes bya ba de gyur pa las bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rnam bsgom zhes bya ba de gyur pa las bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that one should meditate on that transformation.

original: rta bdun ldan pa ni nyi ma'o //
analyzed: rta bdun ldan pa ni nyi ma'o //
translated: The one with seven horses is the sun.

original: dmar po yin pa'i phyir de nyid ni dkyil 'khor dmar po'o ;
analyzed: dmar po yin pa'i phyir de nyid ni dkyil 'khor dmar po'o ;
translated: Because it is red, it is the red mandala.

original: / rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni las kyi dkyil 'khor te nyi ma nyid do //
analyzed: / rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni las kyi dkyil 'khor te nyi ma nyid do //
translated: The vajra action maṇḍala is the action maṇḍala, which is the sun itself.

original: gzhan ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub mi nus na ngal so ba'i rgyur mi snang ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub mi nus na ngal so ba'i rgyur mi snang ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub gsungs pa /
translated: Now, if a practitioner who has attained the signs is unable to accomplish the great seal, the powers of invisibility, etc., are taught as a means of resting.

original: mi tshil zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste don ni 'di @91a * //🔽yin no ; / rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor bas sngon du bsnyen pa byas la mdung gis phug pa'am /
analyzed: mi tshil zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste don ni 'di @91a * // yin no ; / rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor bas sngon du bsnyen pa byas la mdung gis phug pa'am /
translated: The meaning is as follows:🔽A vajra action practitioner, having performed the preliminary service, should make a wick from human fat, human hair, and cotton fluff,🔽in a human skull that has been pierced by a spear,

original: dpyangs pa'am / mtshon gyis rgyab pa'i mi'i thod par de lta bu'i tshil la mi'i skra dang aa rka'i spra ba bsres pas sdong bu byas la mar me sbar te /
analyzed: dpyangs pa'am / mtshon gyis rgyab pa'i mi'i thod par de lta bu'i tshil la mi'i skra dang aa rka'i spra ba bsres pas sdong bu byas la mar me sbar te /
translated: or hung, or struck by a weapon.

original: de'i steng du thod pa gzhan zhig la ji skad gsungs pa'i gnas su du ba bsgrubs la de bsdus nas thod par bzhag la /
analyzed: de'i steng du thod pa gzhan zhig la ji skad gsungs pa'i gnas su du ba bsgrubs la de bsdus nas thod par bzhag la /
translated: Having lit the lamp, on top of that, in another skull, one should produce the smoke as described in the prescribed place, collect it, and place it in the skull.

original: de yang rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms nas mar ngo'i gang yang rung ba zhig gi nub mo lag pa g-yon bas bkab nas /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms nas mar ngo'i gang yang rung ba zhig gi nub mo lag pa g-yon bas bkab nas /
translated: Having meditated on the yoga of Vajrakarma, on the evening of any waning moon, cover with the left hand

original: ji srid 'bar ba'i bar du ba zlas pa byas nas de mig la bskus na sus kyang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ji srid 'bar ba'i bar du ba zlas pa byas nas de mig la bskus na sus kyang mi mthong ngo //
translated: and repeat until it blazes. If one anoints one's eyes with that, no one will see one.

original: 'jig rten gsum du yang spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du yang spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will also move about in the three worlds.

original: du ba byung bas na sa spyod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du ba byung bas na sa spyod du 'gyur ro //
translated: If smoke arises, one will move about on the earth.

original: dro bas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: dro bas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: If it is warm, one will be loved by all beings. This is the esoteric instruction.

original: rkang mgyogs bsgrub pa ni de'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: rkang mgyogs bsgrub pa ni de'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: The accomplishment of the foot-swift one is by the yoga of that.

original: gur gum zhes bya ba ni mngal nas skyes pa'i rang byung gi khrag go //
analyzed: gur gum zhes bya ba ni mngal nas skyes pa'i rang byung gi khrag go //
translated: Camphor is the blood of a womb-born self-arisen.

original: de yang gur gum mngal gyi khrag yin no zhes bya ba bstan pas so //
analyzed: de yang gur gum mngal gyi khrag yin no zhes bya ba bstan pas so //
translated: Moreover, it is taught that camphor is the blood of a womb.

original: khrag ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i sha'i las bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: khrag ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i sha'i las bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: The blood is the flesh previously taught. The action is the esoteric instruction.

original: sngar bstan pa'i gnas su sngar bstan pa bzhag la der rdo rje las rnam par bsgoms nas lag pa g-yas pas bkab la ji srid du sngar bstan pa'i dngos grub gsum 'byung gi bar du bzla bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i gnas su sngar bstan pa bzhag la der rdo rje las rnam par bsgoms nas lag pa g-yas pas bkab la ji srid du sngar bstan pa'i dngos grub gsum 'byung gi bar du bzla bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having placed the previously explained [mantra] in the previously explained place, having meditated on a vajra there, one should cover it with one's right hand and recite it as long as the three powers arise, as previously explained.

original: ri lu sgrub pa'i thabs ni /
analyzed: ri lu sgrub pa'i thabs ni /
translated: The method of accomplishing the pill:

original: gser dang dngul dang zangs ma rnams //
analyzed: gser dang dngul dang zangs ma rnams //
translated: gold, silver, and copper,🔽three or four parts each,🔽the first is the rabbit, the second is the bull,

original: man cha gsum dang bzhi bzhi dag / ra ri dang po thub ba dang // yon tan mda' yis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: man cha gsum dang bzhi bzhi dag / ra ri dang po thub ba dang // yon tan mda' yis bshad pa'o //
translated: and the third is explained by the arrow of qualities.

original: rim pa bzhin du ri lur bcing //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du ri lur bcing //
translated: They are to be bound into a pill in order.

original: zhes bya ba 'di dag gis sha lnga dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi lnga rgya shug ge 'bras bu tsam mam ras ba la gyi 'bras bu tsam mam /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di dag gis sha lnga dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi lnga rgya shug ge 'bras bu tsam mam ras ba la gyi 'bras bu tsam mam /
translated: These are the five meats and the five nectars, the size of a jujube fruit or the size of a jujube seed.

original: rim pa bzhin gtubs nas de'i rnam par bsgoms la lag pas bka ba cing ji srid 'bar bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin gtubs nas de'i rnam par bsgoms la lag pas bka ba cing ji srid 'bar bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
translated: Having cut them into pieces in order, having meditated on their form, one should cover them with one's hand and recite them as long as they blaze.

original: de nas khar bcug nas gang du 'dod pa der bsams pa tsam gyis thogs pa med par 'gro'o //
analyzed: de nas khar bcug nas gang du 'dod pa der bsams pa tsam gyis thogs pa med par 'gro'o //
translated: Then, having placed it in one’s mouth, one can go wherever one wishes, merely by thinking of it, without impediment.🔽“The accomplishment of the sword: One should make a sword from lodestone-metal, which has come from the seed of the six-faced one.

original: ral gri sgrub pa ni gdong drug pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i khab long gi lcags las byas pa'i ral gri de'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i bdag nyid du bsgoms nas lag pas bzung nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: ral gri sgrub pa ni gdong drug pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i khab long gi lcags las byas pa'i ral gri de'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i bdag nyid du bsgoms nas lag pas bzung nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
translated: Having meditated on it as having the nature of that [god], one should hold it with one’s hand and recite [mantras] until it blazes.

original: de nas de blangs nas thogs pa med ba'i gang du 'dod pa @91b der 'gro'o //
analyzed: de nas de blangs nas thogs pa med ba'i gang du 'dod pa @91b der 'gro'o //
translated: Then, having taken it, one can go wherever one wishes, without impediment.

original: sum cu pas khros kyang mi 'pham mo //
analyzed: sum cu pas khros kyang mi 'pham mo //
translated: Even if one is angry with thirty [people], one will not be defeated.

original: de bzhin du zhe sdang gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis lcags las byas pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhe sdang gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis lcags las byas pa'am /
translated: In the same way, through the yoga of Aṅkurika, one should accomplish a sword made of iron,

original: gser las byas pa'i rdo rje la bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gser las byas pa'i rdo rje la bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: or one made of gold.

original: de bzhin du gti mug gi rnal 'byor gyis ni dngul las byas pa 'am shel las byas pa'i 'khor lo thogs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gti mug gi rnal 'byor gyis ni dngul las byas pa 'am shel las byas pa'i 'khor lo thogs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, through the yoga of Mohavajrā, one should accomplish a vidyādhara who holds a wheel made of silver or crystal.

original: de bzhin du phra ma'i rnal 'byor gyis ni rin po che margad cha dgu pas ni rin po che'i rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //🔽de bzhin 'dod chags kyi rnal 'byor gyis zangs las byas pa 'am padma r'a ga las byas pa'i padmas ni padma thogs pa'i rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phra ma'i rnal 'byor gyis ni rin po che margad cha dgu pas ni rin po che'i rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o // de bzhin 'dod chags kyi rnal 'byor gyis zangs las byas pa 'am padma r'a ga las byas pa'i padmas ni padma thogs pa'i rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, by the yoga of slander, one should accomplish the feat of a gem-holding awareness holder with a nine-faceted emerald gem.🔽Likewise, by the yoga of passion, one should accomplish the feat of a lotus-holding awareness holder with a lotus made of copper or ruby.

original: de bzhin du kyo ba dang / zhags pa dang / gi wang gi thig le dang / mchil lham la sogs pa rgyud gzhan du mthong ba dag la yang las kyi rnal 'byor nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du kyo ba dang / zhags pa dang / gi wang gi thig le dang / mchil lham la sogs pa rgyud gzhan du mthong ba dag la yang las kyi rnal 'byor nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Likewise, one should accomplish the feat of a hook-holding awareness holder with a hook, the feat of a noose-holding awareness holder with a noose, the feat of a censer-holding awareness holder with an incense censer, and the feat of a sandal-wearing awareness holder with sandals and so on, by the yoga of action alone, as seen in other tantras.

original: las kyi dngos grub sna tshogs kyi rgyu mtshan gyi khyad par gyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs kyis de dang de bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi dngos grub sna tshogs kyi rgyu mtshan gyi khyad par gyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs kyis de dang de bsgrub pa'o //
translated: The cause of various feats is the special deity yoga, and by that one accomplishes this and that.

original: rim par phye ba gang du bstan pa de la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rim par phye ba gang du bstan pa de la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is also called a “chapter” in the sense of that which is taught in sequence.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the third chapter of the Sri-Bhairava-tantra, composed by the teacher Sridhara.

original: // / da ni gdug pa can dang zhi ba dang bar ma rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / da ni gdug pa can dang zhi ba dang bar ma rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to take care of the wicked, the peaceful, and the middling,

original: rnal 'byor pas tshar bcad pa dang / rjes su gzung ba'i las bya'o zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas tshar bcad pa dang / rjes su gzung ba'i las bya'o zhes bya ba las /
translated: the yogi should perform the actions of destroying and taking care.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas yon tan rgya mtsho rnams gsan zhes bya ba'i bar gyis de'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa gsungs pa yin no //🔽bud med dbang du bya ba dang srung ba la ni gi wang gis so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas yon tan rgya mtsho rnams gsan zhes bya ba'i bar gyis de'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa gsungs pa yin no // bud med dbang du bya ba dang srung ba la ni gi wang gis so //
translated: Then the Blessed One... up to... the oceans of good qualities, with this he declares the request of the Tathagatas for the sake of that.🔽For bringing women under one's power and protecting them, use guggulu.

original: skyes pa la gur kum gyis so //
analyzed: skyes pa la gur kum gyis so //
translated: For men, use saffron.

original: ngag rengs par bya ba la khyad par 'di yod do //
analyzed: ngag rengs par bya ba la khyad par 'di yod do //
translated: This is the difference for paralyzing speech.

original: bsgrub bya'i lce la lam las skyes pa'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnon pa'i gshin rje gshed ser por bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i lce la lam las skyes pa'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnon pa'i gshin rje gshed ser por bsgom par bya'o //
translated: On the tongue of the victim, which is the object of the rite, one should visualize a great wheel of power arisen from the path, and on that a variegated vajra arisen from hūṃ, and on that a yellow Yamāri.🔽The wrathful emanation for the destruction is stated:

original: tshar gcod pa'i sbrul pa'i khro bo gsungs pa ba spu'i khung nas zhes bya ba sogs pa la /
analyzed: tshar gcod pa'i sbrul pa'i khro bo gsungs pa ba spu'i khung nas zhes bya ba sogs pa la /
translated: “from the pores of the skin” and so forth.

original: chen po ni ba spu'i khung chen po ste khung bu'i tshogs so //
analyzed: chen po ni ba spu'i khung chen po ste khung bu'i tshogs so //
translated: The “great pores” are the great pores of the skin, the collection of pores.

original: de las rnam par spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de las rnam par spro bar bya'o //
translated: One should emanate from them.

original: rang gi bdag po zhes bya ba la rigs ni gti mug la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi bdag po zhes bya ba la rigs ni gti mug la sogs pa'o //
translated: “One’s own lord” means the family, such as the family of delusion.

original: de dang @92a * //
analyzed: de dang @92a * //
translated: That

original: ldan pa ni bdag po ste rigs kyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni bdag po ste rigs kyi bdag po'o //
translated: is the lord, the lord of the family.

original: 'di rang yang yin la rigs kyi bdag po yang yin pas rang rigs bdag po'o //
analyzed: 'di rang yang yin la rigs kyi bdag po yang yin pas rang rigs bdag po'o //
translated: Since this is one’s own and also the lord of the family, it is one’s own family lord.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this.

original: 'dis bdag nyid kyi rigs kyi khro bo'i gzugs kyis spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis bdag nyid kyi rigs kyi khro bo'i gzugs kyis spro bar bya'o //
translated: One should emanate in the form of the wrathful one of one’s own family.

original: de rnam par spros nas bsgrub bya'i lus la zhugs te de la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi lha yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de rnam par spros nas bsgrub bya'i lus la zhugs te de la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi lha yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Having emanated them, they enter the body of the victim and worship the gnosis deity who resides there.

original: de'i las de byed par shes par bya ste bcom ldan 'das rnams 'di ni 'di lta bu'i las byed pa dmyal bar 'gro ba yin gyi de'i phyir 'di yongs su btang par 'tshal lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag de ma thag tu de btang nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i las de byed par shes par bya ste bcom ldan 'das rnams 'di ni 'di lta bu'i las byed pa dmyal bar 'gro ba yin gyi de'i phyir 'di yongs su btang par 'tshal lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag de ma thag tu de btang nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They should be known to perform that action, and the Blessed Ones say, “This one is going to hell for performing such an action, so we must release him.”

original: de nas yon chab la sogs pa phul la rang gi ye shes kyi sa bon la gzhug go //
analyzed: de nas yon chab la sogs pa phul la rang gi ye shes kyi sa bon la gzhug go //
translated: Then, having offered water for the feet and so forth, they should enter into one’s own gnosis seed.

original: rang gi khro bo'i tshogs kyis de'i srung ba la sogs pa blangs nas 'ong bar byed do //
analyzed: rang gi khro bo'i tshogs kyis de'i srung ba la sogs pa blangs nas 'ong bar byed do //
translated: The assembly of one’s own wrathful ones should take up his protection and so forth and come.

original: srung ba la sogs pa de dag kyang nyid kyi btsun mo'i padma'i nang du gshin rje gshed khro bo'i phur bus btab la rdo rjes btsir bar bya'o //
analyzed: srung ba la sogs pa de dag kyang nyid kyi btsun mo'i padma'i nang du gshin rje gshed khro bo'i phur bus btab la rdo rjes btsir bar bya'o //
translated: Those protections and so forth should be placed in the lotus of one’s own queen, and one should nail them with the dagger of wrathful Yamântaka and press them down with a vajra.

original: phyi nas las thams cad kyang bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nas las thams cad kyang bya'o //
translated: Afterwards, one should perform all actions.

original: gsal por ni bla ma las shes so //
analyzed: gsal por ni bla ma las shes so //
translated: It should be known in detail from the guru.

original: 'khrul 'khor ni bris pa'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor ni bris pa'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The machine is the written wheel.

original: sngags ni hr'i: shtr'i: la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni hr'i: shtr'i: la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mantra is HRĪḤ ṢTRĪḤ and so forth.

original: rgyud ni bsam gtan to //
analyzed: rgyud ni bsam gtan to //
translated: The tantra is meditation.

original: 'di dag nyid gsad pa la sogs pa la 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir na dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'di dag nyid gsad pa la sogs pa la 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir na dam tshig go //
translated: These are the commitments because they should not be transgressed in killing and so forth.

original: gang du rim par phyi ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang du rim par phyi ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Where they are arranged in order, that is called “wheel.”

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the fourth chapter in the commentary on the Shri Kalachakra composed by the master Shri Dharaka.

original: // / da ni sngar bstan pa'i mngon spyod kyi phyogs gcig dbye ba dang bskrad pa'i las gnyis nye bar gzhag par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / da ni sngar bstan pa'i mngon spyod kyi phyogs gcig dbye ba dang bskrad pa'i las gnyis nye bar gzhag par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to present the two activities of dividing and expelling, which are one part of the previously taught destructive activity,

original: 'khor lo rim bzhin bri ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'khor lo rim bzhin bri ba gsungs pa /
translated: it is said that the wheel is drawn in stages.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
translated: Then, etc. is easy to understand.

original: lhor bltas la zhes bya ba ni lhor mngon par phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: lhor bltas la zhes bya ba ni lhor mngon par phyogs pa'o //
translated: Facing south means facing south.

original: rang khrag ces bya ba ni srin lag gi'o //
analyzed: rang khrag ces bya ba ni srin lag gi'o //
translated: One’s blood means from the ring finger.

original: ro bsregs thal ba ni dur khrod kyi me'i'o //
analyzed: ro bsregs thal ba ni dur khrod kyi me'i'o //
translated: The ashes of the burnt corpse are those of the cemetery fire.

original: smyon pa'i khu ba ni da du ra'i 'dab ma'i khu ba'o //
analyzed: smyon pa'i khu ba ni da du ra'i 'dab ma'i khu ba'o //
translated: The juice of the insane is the juice of the leaves of datura.

original: ras ni ras nyid do //
analyzed: ras ni ras nyid do //
translated: The cloth is cloth itself.

original: gshin rje'i lus la gnas pa zhes pa ni gshin rje'i lto bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje'i lus la gnas pa zhes pa ni gshin rje'i lto bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The one who dwells in the body of Yama is the one who dwells in the belly of Yama.

original: rta dang ma he ni rgyab tu'o //
analyzed: rta dang ma he ni rgyab tu'o //
translated: The horse and buffalo are on the back.

original: bskrad pa ni gdong pa'o //
analyzed: bskrad pa ni gdong pa'o //
translated: The expulsion is on the face.

original: rnga mo'i lus la bskyon zhes pa ni rgyab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rnga mo'i lus la bskyon zhes pa ni rgyab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: The one mounted on the body of the camel is the one who dwells on the back.

original: btsun mo'i snying @92b ga ni padma'o //
analyzed: btsun mo'i snying @92b ga ni padma'o //
translated: The heart of the queen is the lotus.

original: ra la zhes bya ba ni ra'i snying la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ra la zhes bya ba ni ra'i snying la gnas pa'o //
translated: The one who dwells in the heart of the ra is the one who dwells in the heart of the ra.

original: ri bo'i dkyil du zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og dang g-yas dang g-yon dang mdun rgyab kyi ri'i dkyil du gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ri bo'i dkyil du zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og dang g-yas dang g-yon dang mdun rgyab kyi ri'i dkyil du gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The one in the middle of the mountain is the one who dwells above, below, to the right, to the left, in front, and behind the mountain. This is the meaning of the one who dwells in the middle of the mountain.

original: shar ba ni rkang pa brgyad yod pa'i seng ge'o //
analyzed: shar ba ni rkang pa brgyad yod pa'i seng ge'o //
translated: The one with eight legs is the lion.

original: de bzhin du smyo bar bya ba ni smyos pa'i byed pa'am //
analyzed: de bzhin du smyo bar bya ba ni smyos pa'i byed pa'am //
translated: Similarly, the one who causes insanity is the agent of insanity,

original: spre'u la sogs pa la bsgrub bya dgod par mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: spre'u la sogs pa la bsgrub bya dgod par mtshon par bya'o //
translated: or the one who places the victim on the monkey, and so on.

original: ro tsa na ni gi wang ste /
analyzed: ro tsa na ni gi wang ste /
translated: Roचना is saffron.

original: bud med dbang du bya ba dang srung ba la'o //
analyzed: bud med dbang du bya ba dang srung ba la'o //
translated: It is used for subjugating and protecting women.

original: kha che ni gur gum ste skyes pa dbang du bya ba dang rgyas pa la'o //
analyzed: kha che ni gur gum ste skyes pa dbang du bya ba dang rgyas pa la'o //
translated: Kumkuma is crocus. It is used for subjugating and prospering men.

original: zhi ba dang rgyas pa ni dge ba'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: zhi ba dang rgyas pa ni dge ba'i sems kyis so //
translated: Pacification and prosperity are done with a virtuous mind.

original: khva ni bya rog chen po'o //
analyzed: khva ni bya rog chen po'o //
translated: Kāka is a large crow.

original: bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni bskrad pa la'o //
analyzed: bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni bskrad pa la'o //
translated: One should write is used for banishing.

original: ro sreg pa ni dur khrod kyi me'o //
analyzed: ro sreg pa ni dur khrod kyi me'o //
translated: The funeral pyre is the fire of a charnel ground.

original: padma kha sbyar ni thod ba kha sbyar ro //
analyzed: padma kha sbyar ni thod ba kha sbyar ro //
translated: The joined lotus is a joined skull cup.

original: mngon spyod gsum la zhes bya ba lha ga ma'o //
analyzed: mngon spyod gsum la zhes bya ba lha ga ma'o //
translated: The three are for destroying.

original: tshar gcad pa ni tshar gcad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshar gcad pa ni tshar gcad par bya ba'o //
translated: One should destroy is used for destroying.🔽Residing in the south is

original: lho phyogs gnas te zhes bya ba ni /🔽kha lhor bltas te gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lho phyogs gnas te zhes bya ba ni / kha lhor bltas te gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: facing south.

original: zhi ba la zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i las la'o //
analyzed: zhi ba la zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i las la'o //
translated: In pacification is for the rite of pacification.

original: ya zhes bya ba ni shar gyi ya'o //
analyzed: ya zhes bya ba ni shar gyi ya'o //
translated: Ya is the ya of the east.

original: ni de gnyi ga zhes bya ba yi ge gnyis so //
analyzed: ni de gnyi ga zhes bya ba yi ge gnyis so //
translated: Ni is both of them, that is, the two syllables.

original: ya ni de'i dbus kyi yi ge ya'o //
analyzed: ya ni de'i dbus kyi yi ge ya'o //
translated: Ya is the ya in the middle of that.

original: ye shes ni gshin rje gshed kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni gshin rje gshed kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is the form of Yamāri.

original: de nyid ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pas mi phyed pas rdo rje ste rnal 'byor pa gang la de yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pas mi phyed pas rdo rje ste rnal 'byor pa gang la de yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That itself is a vajra because it is not divided by the conceptualization of subject and object. One who has that is called a yogin.

original: rab tu drag pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor lo che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu drag pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor lo che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa'o //
translated: With “very fierce” and so forth, the nature of the great wheel is taught.

original: 'khor lo bri ba'i go rims gong du bstan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo bri ba'i go rims gong du bstan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The order of drawing the wheel is taught above.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba lnga ba'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba lnga ba'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the fifth chapter in the commentary on glorious Black Yamāri composed by Master Śrīdhara.

original: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba nas //
analyzed: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba nas //
translated: Now, from “then” up to

original: dbu la gshin rje gshed po bsgom //
analyzed: dbu la gshin rje gshed po bsgom //
translated: meditate on Yamāri on the head.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rgyas gdab ba gsungs nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rgyas gdab ba gsungs nas /
translated: Having taught the sealing,

original: gtor ma sngon du 'gro ba'i 'khor lo rnam par lta ba'i rim par phye ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: gtor ma sngon du 'gro ba'i 'khor lo rnam par lta ba'i rim par phye ba gsungs pa /
translated: the chapter on the wheel’s view, preceded by the bali, is taught.

original: de yang rtag tu dkyil 'khor sgom par byed pa dang / dam tshig sgrub pa la brtson pa dang / dam tshig sgrub pa la brtson pa dang / sdom pa gzung ba dang dbang thob pas bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rtag tu dkyil 'khor sgom par byed pa dang / dam tshig sgrub pa la brtson pa dang / dam tshig sgrub pa la brtson pa dang / sdom pa gzung ba dang dbang thob pas bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should train in the mandala meditation, in the effort to accomplish the commitments, in the effort to accomplish the vows, in the vow-taking, and in the attainment of initiation.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
