analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to demonstrate just that,

original: rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
analyzed: rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
translated: one should always draw the mandala.

original: zhes bya ba la bri bar bya ba ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bri bar bya ba ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Here, “one should draw” means “one should meditate.”

original: rtag tu ni rgyun du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ni rgyun du'o //
translated: “Always” means “continuously.”

original: sbyin sreg ni @93a * //
analyzed: sbyin sreg ni @93a * //
translated: The fire sacrifice

original: nang gi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid can no //
translated: is of the nature of the inner.

original: dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
translated: The commitments are to be guarded and to be eaten.

original: de la bsrung ba ni mtshams med pa byed pa las so //
analyzed: de la bsrung ba ni mtshams med pa byed pa las so //
translated: Among them, guarding is from the one who commits the immediate offenses.

original: bza' ba ni go ku la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba ni go ku la sogs pa'o //
translated: Eating is the cow, etc.

original: sdom pa ni slob dpon gyi'o //
analyzed: sdom pa ni slob dpon gyi'o //
translated: The vow is that of the master.

original: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: The brief indication of the initiation is stated by “first,” etc.

original: rgyas par bstan pa yang bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyas par bstan pa yang bshad par bya'o //
translated: The extensive explanation should be stated.

original: zla ba bza' ba zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba bza' ba zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The moon-eating is the secret consecration.

original: bzhi po 'di ni dbang chen po //
analyzed: bzhi po 'di ni dbang chen po //
translated: These four are the great consecration.

original: zhes bya ba la dbang bskur ba bzhi po 'di nyid shes rab ye shes kyi rgyu'i gnas skabs tsam dang de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dbang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dbang bskur ba bzhi po 'di nyid shes rab ye shes kyi rgyu'i gnas skabs tsam dang de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dbang ni ma yin no //
translated: In these four consecrations, the consecration is not the cause of the knowledge of wisdom, because it is merely the occasion of the cause of the knowledge of wisdom, and because it is the nature of reality.

original: dri ma 'khrud par chos mthun pas so zhe na de yin du zad mod bdag la ci gnod //
analyzed: dri ma 'khrud par chos mthun pas so zhe na de yin du zad mod bdag la ci gnod //
translated: If it is said, Because of the similarity of the purification of defilement, that is so, but what harm is there to me?

original: sngags ni de nas bshad par bya //
analyzed: sngags ni de nas bshad par bya //
translated: The mantra is explained after that.

original: zhes bya ba ni rab kyi mthar thug par bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rab kyi mthar thug par bshad par bya'o //
translated: It is to be explained as the ultimate of the best.

original: rab kyi mthar thug pa'i don yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar rgyas par bstan pas 'dir mi brjod do //
analyzed: rab kyi mthar thug pa'i don yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar rgyas par bstan pas 'dir mi brjod do //
translated: The meaning of the ultimate of the best is not mentioned here, because it is taught in detail in the mandala ritual.

original: phyi rol gyi lha ma nyes par bya ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi lha ma nyes par bya ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
translated: The external deity is said to be the place of non-error.

original: dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni //
translated: Having made a triangular mandala,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: gru gsum ni zur gsum mo //
analyzed: gru gsum ni zur gsum mo //
translated: The triangular is the three corners.

original: chu ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: chu ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The water is the bodhicitta.

original: bsres zhes bya ba ni khrag dang gsal byed lnga'o //
analyzed: bsres zhes bya ba ni khrag dang gsal byed lnga'o //
translated: The “mixture” is blood and the five vowels.

original: don ni 'di yin te gsal byed lnga dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi lngas dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas la der phyi rol gyi lha rnams tshim par bya zhing gtor ma yang der sbyin par bya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te gsal byed lnga dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi lngas dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas la der phyi rol gyi lha rnams tshim par bya zhing gtor ma yang der sbyin par bya zhes bya'o //
translated: The meaning is that one should make a triangle maṇḍala with the five nectars together with the five vowels, and one should satisfy the external deities there and also give the bali there.

original: ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya //
analyzed: ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya //
translated: One should also recall “ha ha.”

original: zhes bya ba ni mnyes nas mjug rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gad mo rnam pa brgyad bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mnyes nas mjug rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gad mo rnam pa brgyad bya'o //
translated: This is the eightfold laughter for the conclusion of the delight.

original: da ni 'khor lo bri ba'i rim pa gsungs pa'i 'khor lo rim gsum byas nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: da ni 'khor lo bri ba'i rim pa gsungs pa'i 'khor lo rim gsum byas nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Now, having made the maṇḍala of three stages, as it is said,

original: dkyil 'khor ma gtogs par re'u mig brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i phyi rol du gzhan re'u mig bcu gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i yang phyi rol du gzhan re'u mig bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ma gtogs par re'u mig brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i phyi rol du gzhan re'u mig bcu gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i yang phyi rol du gzhan re'u mig bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: one should draw the maṇḍala of eight chambers, excluding the maṇḍala, and outside of that, another maṇḍala of twelve chambers, and outside of that, another maṇḍala of sixteen chambers.

original: ji skad gsungs pa'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i cho ga dang las de dang de'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: ji skad gsungs pa'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i cho ga dang las de dang de'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: By the yoga of that and that rite, according to the rite of pacification and enrichment as taught.

original: mkhas pa ni goms pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: mkhas pa ni goms pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Skilled means having the nature of practice.

original: kun du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kun du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Everywhere means

original: rnam pa kun gyis dgod par bya //🔽zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyis dgod par bya // zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: in all ways.🔽The meaning is that one should arrange the twelve-syllable mantra.

original: grub pa'i sngags ni yi ge bcu gnyis pa'i yatstsha ni r'a dza sa do ru na yo ni ra zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: grub pa'i sngags ni yi ge bcu gnyis pa'i yatstsha ni r'a dza sa do ru na yo ni ra zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: The twelve-syllable mantra is recited as yac ca ni ra dzā sa do ru na yo ni ra.

original: re'u mig @93b bcu gnyis par dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: re'u mig @93b bcu gnyis par dgod par bya'o //
translated: It should be arranged in the twelve-part grid.

original: 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The greatness of this is stated:

original: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
analyzed: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
translated: Accomplishment without exception or remainder.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste lhag ma ma lus pa ni ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste lhag ma ma lus pa ni ma lus pa'o //
translated: Here, without exception means without remainder.

original: de nas lus pa med par 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: de nas lus pa med par 'grub pa'o //
translated: Then, accomplishment without remainder.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is it?

original: 'jig rten gsum ste 'jig rten gsum gyi las zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum ste 'jig rten gsum gyi las zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The three worlds means the three worlds' activities.

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
translated: The remainder is the moving and unmoving.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags gsungs pa /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags gsungs pa /
translated: The root mantra is stated:

original: ya ma r'a dza zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ya ma r'a dza zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Yama Raja and so forth.

original: dkyil du yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig la'o //
analyzed: dkyil du yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig la'o //
translated: In the center means in the square of the mandala.

original: kshe ma med ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su'o //
analyzed: kshe ma med ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su'o //
translated: Kshema means in the east and so forth.

original: h'um gnyis dang bcas pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming las thams cad la dgod par bya'o zhes gsungs pas bsgrub bya'i ming ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: h'um gnyis dang bcas pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming las thams cad la dgod par bya'o zhes gsungs pas bsgrub bya'i ming ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Since it is said one should write the name of the victim with two hums in all cases, the name of the victim is namaḥ and so forth.

original: re'u mig bcu gnyis pa'i sngags gsungs pa /
analyzed: re'u mig bcu gnyis pa'i sngags gsungs pa /
translated: The mantra of the twelve squares is stated:

original: yatstsha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yatstsha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Yatsha and so forth.

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni re'u mig brgyad pa'i phyi rol re'u mig bcu gnyis pa la'o //
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni re'u mig brgyad pa'i phyi rol re'u mig bcu gnyis pa la'o //
translated: The outside is the twelve squares outside the eight squares.

original: g-yon nas brtsams zhes bya ba ni phyi na ci log tu'o //
analyzed: g-yon nas brtsams zhes bya ba ni phyi na ci log tu'o //
translated: Beginning from the left means in the reverse order on the outside.

original: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni re'u mig bcu drug pa la'o //
analyzed: gsum pa zhes bya ba ni re'u mig bcu drug pa la'o //
translated: The third is the sixteen squares.

original: cha re bor ba la ste de'i re'u mig dang po la aom de'i rgyab tu hr'i:'o //
analyzed: cha re bor ba la ste de'i re'u mig dang po la aom de'i rgyab tu hr'i:'o //
translated: The first square of that is om, and behind that is hrīḥ.

original: de'i gnyis pa la shatri:'o //
analyzed: de'i gnyis pa la shatri:'o //
translated: The second of those is ṣṭṛiḥ.

original: de'i rgyab tu wi'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu wi'o //
translated: Behind that is vi.

original: gsum pa la ni kri'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni kri'o //
translated: In the third, kṛt.

original: de'i rgyab tu t'a'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu t'a'o //
translated: Behind that, ta.

original: bzhi pa la ni na'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la ni na'o //
translated: In the fourth, na.

original: de'i rgyab tu yang na'o//
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu yang na'o//
translated: Behind that, na.

original: lnga pa la ni h'um ngo //
analyzed: lnga pa la ni h'um ngo //
translated: In the fifth, hūṃ.

original: de'i rgyab tu yang h'um ngo //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu yang h'um ngo //
translated: Behind that, hūṃ.

original: drug pa la ni pha'o //
analyzed: drug pa la ni pha'o //
translated: In the sixth, pha.

original: de'i rgyab tu ta'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu ta'o //
translated: Behind that, ta.

original: bdun pa la yang de nyid do //
analyzed: bdun pa la yang de nyid do //
translated: In the seventh, that itself.

original: brgyad pa la ni sv'a'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la ni sv'a'o //
translated: In the eighth, svā.

original: de'i rgyab tu ni h'a'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu ni h'a'o //
translated: Behind that, ha.

original: de ltar mdor bsdus nas bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar mdor bsdus nas bri bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, in brief, one should write.

original: aom hr'i: shtri: bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ śṛiṃ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: zhes bya ba re'u mig brgyad po la dgod par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba re'u mig brgyad po la dgod par ro //
translated: One should place this in the eight squares.

original: yang 'di ni mngon spyod tsam la yin no //
analyzed: yang 'di ni mngon spyod tsam la yin no //
translated: Moreover, this is for mere violent action.

original: zhi ba la sogs pa la ni tshul ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa la ni tshul ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
translated: In pacification and so forth, it is as it is.

original: bor ba'i re'u mig rnams la yang bri bar bya ba yin pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: bor ba'i re'u mig rnams la yang bri bar bya ba yin pas gsungs pa /
translated: One should also write in the squares that are omitted. Therefore it is said:

original: de'i bar dag thams cad kyi //
analyzed: de'i bar dag thams cad kyi //
translated: In all the spaces between them,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste las dang rjes su mthun par ni zhes bya ba ni las ji lta ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste las dang rjes su mthun par ni zhes bya ba ni las ji lta ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas so //
translated: And so forth means that it is in accordance with the karma, that is, following the karma.

original: phyag 'tshal zhes pa ni aom mo //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal zhes pa ni aom mo //
translated: The homage is the syllable Oṃ.

original: de'i phyi nas na ma'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi nas na ma'o //
translated: After that is the namaḥ.

original: de'i rjes la sngags dang ming ngo //🔽mtha' dang ldan par yang na ma'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la sngags dang ming ngo // mtha' dang ldan par yang na ma'o //
translated: After that is the mantra and the name.🔽At the end is the namaḥ.

original: zhes bya ba'i sv'a h'a'i ltag tu yang na ma: ste zhi ba la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sv'a h'a'i ltag tu yang na ma: ste zhi ba la'o //
translated: At the end of the svāhā, there is also namaḥ, for pacifying.

original: rgyas pa la ni pushtim boo sha ta'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa la ni pushtim boo sha ta'o //
translated: For increasing, it is puṣṭiṃ vausat.

original: dbang la ni wa sham boo sha ta ho /
analyzed: dbang la ni wa sham boo sha ta ho /
translated: For controlling, it is vaśaṃ vausat hoḥ.

original: rjes su h'um phat ni mtha' ste /
analyzed: rjes su h'um phat ni mtha' ste /
translated: At the end, there is hum phat,

original: @94a * // mngon spyod la'o //
analyzed: @94a * // mngon spyod la'o //
translated: for destroying.

original: ji ltar rigs pas byed ces bya ba byed pa por 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs pas byed ces bya ba byed pa por 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that one should do as is appropriate means that one becomes the agent.

original: rim par phye ba gong du 'khor lo rnam par bri bar dgod par kun du bstan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rim par phye ba gong du 'khor lo rnam par bri bar dgod par kun du bstan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is said with reference to the previously taught arrangement of the cakras to be drawn in sequence.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba drug pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba drug pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the sixth chapter in the commentary on glorious Black Yamari composed by Acarya Shridhara.🔽Now, in order to subdue the wicked and to engage sentient beings, the yogi who has attained the signs should do this.

original: // / da ni rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob bas gdug pa can tshar bcad cing sems can gzhug pa'o zhes bya bas de'i phyir gdug pa can tshar bcad pa gsungs pa zhal gsum phyag drug ces bya ba la sogs pa ste bsgom bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel
analyzed: // / da ni rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob bas gdug pa can tshar bcad cing sems can gzhug pa'o zhes bya bas de'i phyir gdug pa can tshar bcad pa gsungs pa zhal gsum phyag drug ces bya ba la sogs pa ste bsgom bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel
translated: Therefore, the subduing of the wicked is taught, beginning with three faces, six arms, and so on, which is connected with what is to be meditated upon.

original: lo // de la snying gar sna tshogs padma dang zla bar yi ge dza bkod la /
analyzed: lo // de la snying gar sna tshogs padma dang zla bar yi ge dza bkod la /
translated: There, having arranged the syllable dzam on a variegated lotus and moon at the heart,

original: sangs rgyas rnams la dmigs nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa ma lus pa bsgrubs la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams la dmigs nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa ma lus pa bsgrubs la /
translated: one should accomplish all the prostrations and so forth, visualizing the buddhas.

original: stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas sngags kyi byin gyis brlab par bya zhing aom las nyi ma h'um las rdo rje'i gur gyi dkyil du padma dang zla ba la dza dang 'khor lo las byung ba'i zhal gsum pa rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku kun dkar ba /
analyzed: stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas sngags kyi byin gyis brlab par bya zhing aom las nyi ma h'um las rdo rje'i gur gyi dkyil du padma dang zla ba la dza dang 'khor lo las byung ba'i zhal gsum pa rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku kun dkar ba /
translated: Having meditated on emptiness, one should bless the mantra. From oṃ, a sun; from hūṃ, a vajra tent; in the middle, a lotus and moon, with jaḥ and a wheel, one should visualize the three-faced one arisen from the wheel, with the root face and body all white,

original: zhal g-yas dang g-yon sngo ba dang dmar ba /
analyzed: zhal g-yas dang g-yon sngo ba dang dmar ba /
translated: the right and left faces blue and red,

original: g-yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri 'dzin pa /
analyzed: g-yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri 'dzin pa /
translated: holding a wheel and sword in the right hands,

original: g-yon na padma dang nor bu 'dzin pa /
analyzed: g-yon na padma dang nor bu 'dzin pa /
translated: holding a lotus and jewel in the left hands,

original: rtsa ba'i g-yas dang g-yon na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa'i tshul can /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i g-yas dang g-yon na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa'i tshul can /
translated: and holding a flaying knife and skull cup in the right and left root hands, embracing.

original: g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs can lus la sha med pa skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'greng ba /
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs can lus la sha med pa skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'greng ba /
translated: With the left leg extended, the body without flesh, the orange hair blazing and standing upward,

original: mi mgo rlon pa khrag 'dzag pa'i phreng ba 'phyong ba rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: mi mgo rlon pa khrag 'dzag pa'i phreng ba 'phyong ba rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: a garland of fresh human heads dripping blood, adorned with bone ornaments,

original: 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro ba'o //
translated: radiating a garland of light.

original: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni 'gugs pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni 'gugs pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: “The wise one” is skilled in summoning.

original: khrag dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni zhes bya ba la de'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: khrag dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni zhes bya ba la de'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: The procedure for summoning blood is as follows:

original: rang gi lce la yi ge dza dmar po bkod la de'i 'ong khab kyi rnam pa lta bus snying phug la /
analyzed: rang gi lce la yi ge dza dmar po bkod la de'i 'ong khab kyi rnam pa lta bus snying phug la /
translated: One should arrange the syllable dza in one's own tongue, and with its light in the form of a needle, one should pierce the heart.

original: de'i phyi nas spros pa'i 'od zer padma'i rnam pa lta bus khrag rnams bkug nas bdag nyid kyi kha gang bar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi nas spros pa'i 'od zer padma'i rnam pa lta bus khrag rnams bkug nas bdag nyid kyi kha gang bar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should imagine that the blood is summoned by light rays emanating from it in the form of lotuses, and that one's own mouth is filled with blood.

original: don 'di 'chad bar 'gyur ba'i kha gdangs pa dag byas pas ni zhes bya bas rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: don 'di 'chad bar 'gyur ba'i kha gdangs pa dag byas pas ni zhes bya bas rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the passage beginning with one should do the gaping mouth procedure that will be explained.

original: phag mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chang dgug pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: phag mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chang dgug pa gsungs pa /
translated: The summoning of beer by the samadhi of Varahi is stated:

original: zhal gsum pa ste rtsa ba'i zhal phag gdong lta bu sngon po'o //
analyzed: zhal gsum pa ste rtsa ba'i zhal phag gdong lta bu sngon po'o //
translated: With three faces, the principal face is like a pig's face, blue.

original: zhal g-yas dang g-yon pa ni dkar po dang dmar po'o //
analyzed: zhal g-yas dang g-yon pa ni dkar po dang dmar po'o //
translated: The right and left faces are white and red.

original: phyag @94b g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri g-yon na 'khor lo padma bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag @94b g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri g-yon na 'khor lo padma bsnams pa /
translated: The right hands hold a vajra and sword, the left a wheel and lotus.

original: phyag gtso bo gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa dang 'khyud pa'i tshul can no //
analyzed: phyag gtso bo gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa dang 'khyud pa'i tshul can no //
translated: The two principal hands hold a curved knife and skull, and embrace.

original: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest, such as the homage, is the same as before.

original: sa dang rdo rje las byung ba zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: sa dang rdo rje las byung ba zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: The difference is that she is born from the earth and the vajra.

original: chang dgug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba la lce la dza dmar po bkod la de'i 'od sbu gu'i rnam pa 'dra bas bkug la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dza mkhan gyi lag pa phyis pa'i sa la bum pa byas par gzhug go //🔽shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dbyangs can ma sprul pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chang dgug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba la lce la dza dmar po bkod la de'i 'od sbu gu'i rnam pa 'dra bas bkug la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dza mkhan gyi lag pa phyis pa'i sa la bum pa byas par gzhug go // shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dbyangs can ma sprul pa gsungs te /
translated: The method of summoning the girl is as follows: One should arrange a red ja on the tongue, and with the light of that, which is like a straw, one should summon her. One should place her in a vase made from the clay of a potter's workshop, as will be explained.

original: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: In order to increase wisdom, Sarasvatī is emanated, as it is said, three faces, six arms, and so on.

original: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa thams cad ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa thams cad ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: All the homage and so forth is the same as before.

original: khyad par ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: khyad par ni 'di yin te /
translated: The difference is as follows:

original: ho dang padma las byung ba'i rtsa ba'i zhal dang lus kun dmar ba g-yas sngo ba g-yon dkar ba g-yas na padma dang ral gri /
analyzed: ho dang padma las byung ba'i rtsa ba'i zhal dang lus kun dmar ba g-yas sngo ba g-yon dkar ba g-yas na padma dang ral gri /
translated: The root face and body are red, born from ho and padma. The right is blue, the left is white. The right hands hold a lotus and a sword.

original: g-yon na 'khor lo dang nor bu 'dzin pa /
analyzed: g-yon na 'khor lo dang nor bu 'dzin pa /
translated: The left hands hold a wheel and a jewel.

original: gzhan dag gis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa'i tshul can zhi ba /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa'i tshul can zhi ba /
translated: The others embrace him in the manner of holding a hooked knife and skull-cup, and are peaceful.

original: rin po che'i rgyan 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyan 'chang ba'o //
translated: He wears jeweled ornaments.

original: 'dir sbyor ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshes kyi dang po nas bzung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir sbyor ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshes kyi dang po nas bzung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the application is to be understood from the statement beginning, “Starting from the first day of the month that is to be explained,” and so forth.

original: khu ba dgug pa'i goo r'i sbrul pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: khu ba dgug pa'i goo r'i sbrul pa gsungs pa /
translated: The performance of the Gaurī mantra for summoning semen is stated:

original: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With three faces, and so forth.

original: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni sngo ba dang dkar ba /
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni sngo ba dang dkar ba /
translated: The right and left faces are blue and white.

original: phyag g-yas na ral gri dang 'khor lo //
analyzed: phyag g-yas na ral gri dang 'khor lo //
translated: The right hands hold a sword and chakram.

original: g-yon na nor bu dang padma bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon na nor bu dang padma bsnams pa /
translated: The left hands hold a jewel and lotus.

original: gzhan dag gis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa'i tshul can ni nor bu margad 'dra ba ni rin po che ljang gu'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa'i tshul can ni nor bu margad 'dra ba ni rin po che ljang gu'o //
translated: The others embrace him in the manner of holding a hooked knife and skull-cup. He is like an emerald jewel, a green jewel.

original: khu ba dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni zhes bya ba ni dza dmar po'i 'od kyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i padma'i kha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: khu ba dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni zhes bya ba ni dza dmar po'i 'od kyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i padma'i kha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas shes par bya'o //
translated: The performance of the Gaurī mantra for summoning semen is to be understood from the statement beginning, “The red light of Jā, the lotus that is to be explained,” and so forth.

original: lha mo kun yang g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: lha mo kun yang g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa'o //
translated: All the goddesses stand in the posture in which the left leg is extended, on variegated lotuses and moons.

original: phag mo dang goo r'i gnyis ni thung zhing lto 'phyang ba'o //
analyzed: phag mo dang goo r'i gnyis ni thung zhing lto 'phyang ba'o //
translated: Vārāhī and Gaurī are short and have protruding bellies.

original: tsa rtsi ka ni skem pa'o //
analyzed: tsa rtsi ka ni skem pa'o //
translated: Cāmuṇḍā is emaciated.

original: dbyangs can ma ni zhi ba'o //
analyzed: dbyangs can ma ni zhi ba'o //
translated: Sarasvatī is peaceful.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ji skad smras pa'i sbyor ba rnams ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ji skad smras pa'i sbyor ba rnams ston par byed pa'o //
translated: Then, etc. teaches the application as stated.

original: khrag 'gugs pa'i zhes bya ba la gang gis khrag 'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje tsa rtsi ka 'di ni byams pa chen po'i ngo bo dang dbyer med pa yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
analyzed: khrag 'gugs pa'i zhes bya ba la gang gis khrag 'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje tsa rtsi ka 'di ni byams pa chen po'i ngo bo dang dbyer med pa yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra of Cāmuṇḍā, who draws blood, is so called because she is inseparable from the essence of great love.

original: de skad ces bya ba'i ting @95a * //🔽nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba'i ting @95a * // nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi is called by that name.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the one that will be explained.

original: sngags zhes bya ba ni yid skyob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba ni yid skyob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The mantra is so called because it protects the mind.

original: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is said is said to be endowed with the teaching.

original: kha zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i gzugs can nyid do //
analyzed: kha zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i gzugs can nyid do //
translated: The word kha is the very form of wrath.

original: gdangs zhes bya ba ni rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: gdangs zhes bya ba ni rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: The word resonance is the unfolding.

original: 'di dag ces pa ni smras ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ces pa ni smras ma thag pa'o //
translated: The word these refers to the just-mentioned [mantras].

original: 'jig rten gsum ni 'jig rten gyi srid pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum ni 'jig rten gyi srid pa'o //
translated: The three worlds are the existence of the world.

original: khrag chen zhes bya ba ni khrag kun no //
analyzed: khrag chen zhes bya ba ni khrag kun no //
translated: The word great blood is all blood.

original: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la ldang ba'i zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la ldang ba'i zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The word arising refers to the Three Jewels and so forth.

original: chang 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la gang gis chang 'gugs pa'i byed pa 'di ni snying rje'i ngo bo dang dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
analyzed: chang 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la gang gis chang 'gugs pa'i byed pa 'di ni snying rje'i ngo bo dang dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra of summoning beer is the agent that summons beer, which is a vajra because it is inseparable from the nature of compassion.

original: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi called by that name is also called by that name.

original: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The word said is endowed with saying.🔽The word pot is the potter's.

original: khru gang tsam gyi bum pa rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas zhes bya ba rdza mkhan gyi'o //🔽bum pa zhes bya ba rdza mkhan gyis so //
analyzed: khru gang tsam gyi bum pa rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas zhes bya ba rdza mkhan gyi'o //🔽bum pa zhes bya ba rdza mkhan gyis so //
translated: The word pot is the potter's.

original: kha mdzes zhes bya ba ni mtho gang gi khyon tsam mo //🔽rkun ma'i skra yi rten gzhag ste //
analyzed: kha mdzes zhes bya ba ni mtho gang gi khyon tsam mo // rkun ma'i skra yi rten gzhag ste //
translated: The mouth is just the size of a span.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpyangs pa'i rkun ma'i skra'i rten la gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpyangs pa'i rkun ma'i skra'i rten la gzhag pa'o //
translated: Placing the hair of the thief means placing it on the support of the hanging hair of the thief.

original: don ni 'di yin te /🔽chang 'tshong gi khyim nas chang blangs la sngar bstan pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i rnal 'byor gyis bum par blugs la shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis rten la bzhag la sngar bstan pa'i cho gas sngags dang gang du bzlas ba byas pa'i chang lus pa med
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te / chang 'tshong gi khyim nas chang blangs la sngar bstan pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i rnal 'byor gyis bum par blugs la shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis rten la bzhag la sngar bstan pa'i cho gas sngags dang gang du bzlas ba byas pa'i chang lus pa med
translated: The meaning is as follows.

original: par 'gugs par byed do //
analyzed: par 'gugs par byed do //
translated: Taking beer from the house of a beer seller, pouring it into a vase with the yoga of Vajravarahi as previously taught, placing it on the support with a very concentrated mind, and reciting the mantra with the previously taught ritual, one should summon the remaining beer.

original: sngags 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: sngags 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni /
translated: The greatness of this mantra is as follows.

original: pa ta na mchod rten du bstan zhes bya ba ni pa ta na'i mchod rten zhes bya ba ao ta'i yul shar phyogs kyi yul gyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram mo //
analyzed: pa ta na mchod rten du bstan zhes bya ba ni pa ta na'i mchod rten zhes bya ba ao ta'i yul shar phyogs kyi yul gyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram mo //
translated: The Patana stupa is the stupa called Patana, on the shore of the ocean in the east of the country of Odivi.

original: der dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du /
analyzed: der dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du /
translated: There, in the mandala of the assembly of lords of heroes and heroines,

original: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mos 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa'i chang bkug go zhes thos te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mos 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa'i chang bkug go zhes thos te /
translated: The Blessed Lady Vajravarahi has summoned all the intoxicants of the three worlds.

original: de nas da ltar yang rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i khyim na nam yang chang zad pa med do zhes zer te /
analyzed: de nas da ltar yang rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i khyim na nam yang chang zad pa med do zhes zer te /
translated: And so, even today, the intoxicants in the house of Vajravarahi's heart are never exhausted.

original: 'di la dad pa rnams kyis dad pa phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'di la dad pa rnams kyis dad pa phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid nye bar bstan to //
translated: This is taught to increase the faith of the faithful in her greatness.

original: dal gyis dmigs nas zhes bya ba ni brtan par byas @95b nas so //
analyzed: dal gyis dmigs nas zhes bya ba ni brtan par byas @95b nas so //
translated: Having focused slowly means having stabilized.

original: rab tu grags zhes pa ni sgrub par ro //
analyzed: rab tu grags zhes pa ni sgrub par ro //
translated: Having become well known means having been accomplished.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la shes rab ni chos thams cad bdag med par rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la shes rab ni chos thams cad bdag med par rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the realization of the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par phyin pa ni son pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par phyin pa ni son pa ste /
translated: Having gone to the other shore of the ocean of conceptualization of cyclic existence and nirvana means having gone to the nonabiding nirvana.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nyid ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dbyer med pa'i ngo bo rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dbyer med pa'i ngo bo rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
translated: That is the vajra, because it is the form of Vajra Sarasvatī, the essence of the inseparability of the perfection of one’s own and others’ aims.

original: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //🔽tshes kyi dang po nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o // tshes kyi dang po nas bzung ste /
translated: The samādhi is called that.

original: kun du zla ba nya yi bar ;
analyzed: kun du zla ba nya yi bar ;
translated: Beginning with the first day of the month,🔽up to the full moon.

original: zhes bya ba la tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba nya'i bar du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba nya'i bar du'o //
translated: From the first day up to the full moon.

original: kun du ni rnam pa kun gyis so //🔽ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug pas //
analyzed: kun du ni rnam pa kun gyis so // ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug pas //
translated: Up to is in all ways.🔽As long as one follows the moon,

original: zhes bya ba ni zla 'phel ba'i rim pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla 'phel ba'i rim pas so //
translated: by the process of the waxing moon.

original: de la mngon du phyogs pas zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: de la mngon du phyogs pas zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: Facing that is the instruction.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is the result of that? It is said, “accomplishment, etc. ”

original: rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: Yoga is the meditative concentration of method and wisdom.

original: de 'di la yod pas rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: de 'di la yod pas rnal 'byor te /
translated: Since that exists here, it is yoga.

original: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed nag po'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed nag po'o //
translated: The Bhagavat is the Black Yamarī.

original: de'i dbang phyug ni ji srid phyag rgya chen po'i bar phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dbang phyug ni ji srid phyag rgya chen po'i bar phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa 'grub pa ste /
translated: Its power is the accomplishment of all that is perfect, up to the Great Seal.

original: 'di'i bsgom pa rab kyi mthar phyin na de lta bu'i dngos grub khyad par can 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di'i bsgom pa rab kyi mthar phyin na de lta bu'i dngos grub khyad par can 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that if one perfects the meditation on this, such a special power will arise.

original: bya ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: bya ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: The result of action is stated:

original: tshigs bcad brgya zhes bya ba la 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: tshigs bcad brgya zhes bya ba la 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
translated: One hundred verses and so on. This is an illustration.

original: brgya dang stong yang zin pa'o //
analyzed: brgya dang stong yang zin pa'o //
translated: One hundred and one thousand are also included.

original: 'di zhes bya dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o ;
analyzed: 'di zhes bya dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o ;
translated: The yogi who possesses this will accomplish

original: /'grub par 'gyur zhes pa ni nges par 'grub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: /'grub par 'gyur zhes pa ni nges par 'grub par byed pa'o //
translated: means he will definitely accomplish.

original: ma lus par zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams so //
analyzed: ma lus par zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams so //
translated: The actions are pacifying and so on, without exception.

original: lus pa med pa ni ji ltar 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: lus pa med pa ni ji ltar 'byung ba ste /
translated: Without remainder means just as they occur.

original: khams gsum pa'i las de ltar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i las de ltar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should perform the actions of the three realms in that way.

original: ma lus pa dag ni zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang khyab 'jug dang bde byed dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i las zhes bya ba'i don te /🔽khu ba 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni gang gis khu ba 'gugs par byed pa 'di la btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bos goo r'i'i rnam pa lta bu'i mi phyed pa yod pa'i phyir rdo rje ste de skad ces bya @96a * //
analyzed: ma lus pa dag ni zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang khyab 'jug dang bde byed dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i las zhes bya ba'i don te / khu ba 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni gang gis khu ba 'gugs par byed pa 'di la btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bos goo r'i'i rnam pa lta bu'i mi phyed pa yod pa'i phyir rdo rje ste de skad ces bya @96a * //
translated: The meaning of all is the activity of taming the disciples, such as the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, Viṣṇu, Brahmā, and so on.

original: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The vajra of semen is the great equanimity that exists in the form of Gaurī, since it is the one that draws up the semen. It is called a vajra because it is indivisible. That is the name of the samādhi.

original: padma'i kha zhes bya ba ni btsun mo'i ze'u 'bru'o //
analyzed: padma'i kha zhes bya ba ni btsun mo'i ze'u 'bru'o //
translated: The lotus is the pistil of the consort.

original: rdo rje nas zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'i rdo rje'i khung bu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nas zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'i rdo rje'i khung bu'o //
translated: The vajra is the opening of the male vajra.

original: rlung zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: rlung zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i rlung ngo //
translated: The wind is the entering wind.

original: dril bu zhes bya ba ni aom ka dha ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi sgra'o//
analyzed: dril bu zhes bya ba ni aom ka dha ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi sgra'o//
translated: The bell is the sound of the mantra oṃ kadhini and so on.

original: lcags kyu'i sbyor ba ni lcags kyu'i rnam pa lta bu'i 'od zer gyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu'i sbyor ba ni lcags kyu'i rnam pa lta bu'i 'od zer gyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: The hook application is the application of light rays in the form of hooks.

original: rlung dang dril bu dang lcags kyu'i sbyor ba ni dril bus lcags kyu'i rlung sbyor ro //
analyzed: rlung dang dril bu dang lcags kyu'i sbyor ba ni dril bus lcags kyu'i rlung sbyor ro //
translated: The wind, bell, and hook application is the wind application of the hook by the bell.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is as follows.

original: dza dmar po lce la bkod pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i rlung dag byung nas bsgrub bya'i bstan pa'i lam nas zhugs nas /
analyzed: dza dmar po lce la bkod pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i rlung dag byung nas bsgrub bya'i bstan pa'i lam nas zhugs nas /
translated: The winds that arise from the light rays that emerge from the red ja placed on the tongue enter the path of the disciple's nose and

original: klad pa na yod pa tshun chad blangs nas bstan pa'i lam du bltas la /
analyzed: klad pa na yod pa tshun chad blangs nas bstan pa'i lam du bltas la /
translated: having drawn up the bodhicitta from the crown of the head and so on, they are seen on the path of the disciple's nose.

original: de las 'jug pa'i rlung gis rang gi khar btung bar bsam mo //
analyzed: de las 'jug pa'i rlung gis rang gi khar btung bar bsam mo //
translated: Then the entering wind drinks it in the disciple's mouth.

original: de yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa /
translated: This is also stated in the following:

original: 'gugs par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ste khu ba'i tshogs ni khu ba bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'gugs par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ste khu ba'i tshogs ni khu ba bsdus pa'o //
translated: The collection of bodhicitta is the gathered bodhicitta.

original: bzlas dang zhes bya ba ni sngags bzlas pa'o//
analyzed: bzlas dang zhes bya ba ni sngags bzlas pa'o//
translated: The recitation is the mantra recitation.

original: bsgoms pa ni goms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgoms pa ni goms par byed pa'o //
translated: The meditation is the familiarization.

original: sbyor ba 'di dag la sems brtan par gyur par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di dag la sems brtan par gyur par bya'o //
translated: One should stabilize the mind in these applications.

original: dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The words solitary and so forth are easy to understand.

original: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang bskur rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang bskur rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, from there... and so forth extensively explains the consecration.

original: nag po 'jig pa zhes bya ba la nag po ni gshin rje gshed nag po'o //
analyzed: nag po 'jig pa zhes bya ba la nag po ni gshin rje gshed nag po'o //
translated: The black destroyer is the black Yamari.

original: de 'jig pa ni nyams par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de 'jig pa ni nyams par byed pa'o //
translated: The destroyer is the one who destroys him.

original: de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dbyer med pas rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dbyer med pas rdo rje'o //
translated: That is the vajra because it is indivisible, being the very essence of the Bhagavat.

original: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi called that is also called that.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is what is to be explained.

original: dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig ces bya ba la /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig ces bya ba la /
translated: The pledge of the supreme consecration.

original: mchog ni gang du dbang bskur bas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o //🔽de ni 'da' bar mi bya ba yin pas dam tshig go //
analyzed: mchog ni gang du dbang bskur bas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o // de ni 'da' bar mi bya ba yin pas dam tshig go //
translated: The supreme is where, by the consecration, the aims of self and other are fulfilled.🔽That is the pledge because it is not to be transgressed.

original: de phyung par mdzad do zhes bya bar gsungs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de phyung par mdzad do zhes bya bar gsungs par gyur pa'o //
translated: He brought it forth means he spoke it.

original: au dumw'a ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa la don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: au dumw'a ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa la don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of udumbara and so on is as follows.

original: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor du 'phangs pa'i phreng ba tshigs bcad 'dis mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor du 'phangs pa'i phreng ba tshigs bcad 'dis mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
translated: At the time of entering the mandala, the garland cast into the mandala should be bound on the head with this verse.

original: yang na // rigs lnga nyid du rtogs pa yi //
analyzed: yang na // rigs lnga nyid du rtogs pa yi //
translated: Or,🔽by the teaching of the five consorts

original: rig ma lnga po bstan pas ni //
analyzed: rig ma lnga po bstan pas ni //
translated: who are known as the five clans,🔽the disciple is caused to understand

original: me tog ming gis slob ma la //🔽bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed //
analyzed: me tog ming gis slob ma la // bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed //
translated: the highest bliss by the name of the flower.
