original: de nyid kyi phyir spros pa med pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir spros pa med pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since it is the nature of the five pristine awarenesses, which are free of conceptual elaborations, it is saluted by all the buddhas.

original: bdud las zhes bya ba ni phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa ni lha'i bu'i bdud de de dag las so //
analyzed: bdud las zhes bya ba ni phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa ni lha'i bu'i bdud de de dag las so //
translated: “From the māras” means from the māra of the aggregates, the māra of the afflictions, the māra of death, and the māra of the devas, who create distractions.

original: las kyi ral gri zhes bya ba ni las thams cad byed pa'i phyir phrag dog gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: las kyi ral gri zhes bya ba ni las thams cad byed pa'i phyir phrag dog gshin rje gshed do //
translated: “Sword of karma” means Karmayama, because he performs all actions.

original: de ni ral gri dang 'dra par ji ltar las thams cad rab tu sgrub pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa gcod par byed pa de bzhin du 'di yang de lta bu'i don du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ni ral gri dang 'dra par ji ltar las thams cad rab tu sgrub pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa gcod par byed pa de bzhin du 'di yang de lta bu'i don du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as a sword is like that, in that it cuts through afflictions by accomplishing all actions, this [ritual] is also like that. This is the meaning.

original: 'di ni / rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o //
translated: This is the bestowal of the vajra conduct.

original: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of wisdom and means.

original: ces bya ba la shes rab nyid rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa nyams par byed pas thabs te de'i ngo bo gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la shes rab nyid rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa nyams par byed pas thabs te de'i ngo bo gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Wisdom itself is the means because it destroys all conceptualization. He who has that as his nature is so called.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid do //🔽de yang // rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //🔽stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid do // de yang // rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa // stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod //
translated: Vajra means emptiness endowed with the most sublime of manifestations.

original: ces gsungs pas so //
analyzed: ces gsungs pas so //
translated: And that is stated:🔽Emptiness endowed with the most sublime of manifestations🔽is called the vajra.

original: de nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pas dril bu'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pas dril bu'o //
translated: That itself is the bell because it accomplishes the welfare of all sentient beings.

original: sgrub pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: Accomplishment is the completion of unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: rdo rje khyod ces bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid khyod ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje khyod ces bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid khyod ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Vajra you means you who are the nature of indivisible pristine awareness.

original: 'di ni dril bu'i dam tshig sngon du 'gro ba'i dbugs dbyung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dril bu'i dam tshig sngon du 'gro ba'i dbugs dbyung ba'o //
translated: This is the encouragement that precedes the bell commitment.

original: slob ma yang dag zung zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma yang dag zung zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
translated: Take the disciple properly means the permission is given.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i mdun na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i mdun na gnas pa'o //
translated: This is in the presence of the guru.

original: bla ma'i rdo rje'i nang gi mthar mthe bong dang srin lag gis mnan pa'i rang gi rig pas myong ba'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i rdo rje'i nang gi mthar mthe bong dang srin lag gis mnan pa'i rang gi rig pas myong ba'o //
translated: One experiences one's own awareness with the thumb and ring finger pressing on the end inside the guru's vajra.

original: btung ba rin po che zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dga' ba rgyas par byed pas rin po che'o //🔽rdo rje'i lus ni rab tu sgrub //
analyzed: btung ba rin po che zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dga' ba rgyas par byed pas rin po che'o // rdo rje'i lus ni rab tu sgrub //
translated: The precious drink is precious because it expands the unsurpassed bliss of the tathagatas.🔽It is said, It accomplishes the vajra body.

original: ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi lus kyi rdo rje ste /🔽ye shes lnga'i @97a * //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi lus kyi rdo rje ste / ye shes lnga'i @97a * //
translated: The vajra body is the nature of the five aggregates.

original: ngo bo nyid de sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid de sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the nature of the five wisdoms, and it accomplishes that.

original: 'thung zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi sbubs su gtong bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'thung zhes bya ba ni longs spyod kyi sbubs su gtong bar byed pa ste /
translated: Drinking means sending it into the sheath of enjoyment.

original: rang rig pa'i mthar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i mthar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is for the sake of the ultimate of one's own awareness.

original: 'dis cir 'gyur ba de gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dis cir 'gyur ba de gsungs pa /
translated: What happens by that?

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said, wisdom.

original: chos thams cad dbyer med pa bla na med pa'i rtog pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos thams cad dbyer med pa bla na med pa'i rtog pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the nature of the unsurpassed thought of all phenomena being inseparable.

original: shin tu dga' ba'i sems zhes bya ba ni brtan pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu dga' ba'i sems zhes bya ba ni brtan pa'o //
translated: The mind of great joy is the firm one.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang gis rig na yang slob ma gzung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang gis rig na yang slob ma gzung ba'i phyir te /
translated: The self is the one that is known by oneself, but in order to take on disciples,

original: de lta bu'i rnam par bzhugs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam par bzhugs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is the meaning of the vajra master who is situated in that way.

original: gang du dgug pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba mngon par brjod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang du dgug pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba mngon par brjod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Where the application of summoning and so forth is expressed, that is what is meant.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las /
translated: In the commentary on the glorious Black Yamari composed by Master Shrīdhara,

original: rim par phye ba bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rim par phye ba bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: this is the explanation of the seventh chapter.

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then, and so forth. After the supplication,

original: rdo rje ni ye shes lnga'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni ye shes lnga'o //
translated: vajra is the five intuitions.

original: de'i bdag nyid 'chang bas rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid 'chang bas rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: The one who holds that nature is the vajra holder.

original: srung ba ni bdung ma lus pa skrod par byed pas rdo rjer ba sprul pa nyid do //
analyzed: srung ba ni bdung ma lus pa skrod par byed pas rdo rjer ba sprul pa nyid do //
translated: The protection is the emanation of the vajra fence that drives away all the maras.

original: 'khor lo ni rdo rjer ba dang gur gyi rnam pa gnyis sbyor bar byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni rdo rjer ba dang gur gyi rnam pa gnyis sbyor bar byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The wheel is so called because it combines the two forms of the vajra and the tent.

original: bgegs ni lus las kun du byung ba'o //
analyzed: bgegs ni lus las kun du byung ba'o //
translated: The obstructors are those that arise from the body.

original: log par 'dren pa ni ngag las kun du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: log par 'dren pa ni ngag las kun du 'byung ba'o //
translated: The misleaders are those that arise from speech.

original: gdug pa can ni sems las kun du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can ni sems las kun du 'byung ba'o //
translated: The wicked are those that arise from the mind.

original: bsal ba ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: bsal ba ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: The removal is the elimination.

original: bdag ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur gcig pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur gcig pa'o //
translated: The self is the oneness of the body of all the tathāgatas.

original: ral gri 'chang zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid rdo rje 'chang de nyid du grub pas ral gri gang 'dzin pa nyid kyis mtshan ma thams cad nye bar mtshon pa'i don to //
analyzed: ral gri 'chang zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid rdo rje 'chang de nyid du grub pas ral gri gang 'dzin pa nyid kyis mtshan ma thams cad nye bar mtshon pa'i don to //
translated: The sword-bearer is the Blessed One himself, who is the vajra-bearer, and is the one who, by holding the sword, indicates all the signs.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this.

original: brjod pa'i dus su ral gri'i gnas su rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dang rin po che bcug pas tshigs su bcad pa lngar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: brjod pa'i dus su ral gri'i gnas su rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dang rin po che bcug pas tshigs su bcad pa lngar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: At the time of recitation, by inserting the vajra, wheel, lotus, and jewel into the place of the sword, it becomes the five verses.

original: bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dang ldan pas dpal ldan no //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dang ldan pas dpal ldan no //
translated: Glorious means endowed with unsurpassed merit and wisdom.

original: ral gri 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ral gri 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The blazing sword is a metaphor, as before.

original: gang la 'bar zhing gsal ba'i gzugs yod pa des gcod pa zhes bya ba 'gegs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la 'bar zhing gsal ba'i gzugs yod pa des gcod pa zhes bya ba 'gegs pa ste /
translated: That which has a blazing, radiant form is cutting, which means obstructing.

original: sngar bstan pa'i bgegs la sogs pa'o //🔽gsal por bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i bgegs la sogs pa'o // gsal por bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: It is the obstruction taught earlier, and so on.

original: rigs gsum las skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs gsum las skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: In order to clarify, it says born from the three families, and so on.

original: rigs gsum ni @97b sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rigs gsum ni @97b sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa'o //
translated: The three families are born from the nature of body, speech, and mind.

original: sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to establish the earth goddess, it says

original: lha mo khyod ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lha mo khyod ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: You, goddess, and so on.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'o //
translated: All buddhas is the second case of the sixth case.

original: slob ma gzhug par gsungs pa gos kyi zhes bya ba ni gos kyi khyad par de dmar po'o //
analyzed: slob ma gzhug par gsungs pa gos kyi zhes bya ba ni gos kyi khyad par de dmar po'o //
translated: Regarding the disciples' entry, it says with cloth, meaning the cloth is distinguished by being red.

original: slob dpon gyis dri bar bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis dri bar bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: The master's questions are stated:

original: khyod su zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khyod su zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Who are you?

original: gang la dga' zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gang la dga' zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: What do you like? is the remainder.

original: slob mas smra bar bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: slob mas smra bar bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: The disciple's response is stated:

original: skal bzang bdag ni zhes bya ba ste bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: skal bzang bdag ni zhes bya ba ste bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: I am fortunate, O Great Bliss, is the remainder.

original: ci zhig byas nas bya ba yin pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas bya ba yin pa de gsungs pa /
translated: Having done what? That is stated:

original: yol ba'i bar du zhes bya ba gos kyi yol ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: yol ba'i bar du zhes bya ba gos kyi yol ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Between the curtains, between the curtains of cloth.

original: bla ma la gsol ba btab pa zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: bla ma la gsol ba btab pa zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: One should supplicate the guru, is the connection.

original: blo bzang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor mthong bar spro ba'i yid can no //
analyzed: blo bzang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor mthong bar spro ba'i yid can no //
translated: Good-minded is one whose mind is eager to see the maṇḍala.

original: gsol ba btab pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gsol ba btab pa gsungs pa /
translated: The supplication is stated:

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni cho ga gang gis so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni cho ga gang gis so //
translated: In whatever way, by whatever rite.

original: sangs rgyas ni chos kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni chos kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The Buddha is the very essence of the nirmāṇakāya, nondual with the dharmakāya.

original: chos chen pos zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs pa'o //
analyzed: chos chen pos zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs pa'o //
translated: By the great Dharma is the state of the saṃbhogakāya.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni bla na med pa'i chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes te de la sems dpas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni bla na med pa'i chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes te de la sems dpas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is so called because he is the mind in the vajra, the gnosis of the great bliss which is the indivisibility of all the unsurpassed dharmas.

original: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni bdag la'o //
analyzed: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni bdag la'o //
translated: To me means to me, the teacher.

original: de bzhin du cho ga des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du cho ga des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should confer initiation by that procedure.

original: mchog ni mngon par 'dod pa de 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni mngon par 'dod pa de 'dod pa'o //
translated: The supreme is the desired object, the desired one.

original: bdag ni bdag go //
analyzed: bdag ni bdag go //
translated: The I is the self.

original: stsal du gsol ba ni byin cig pa'o //
analyzed: stsal du gsol ba ni byin cig pa'o //
translated: The grant is the giving.

original: slob ma'i bya ba mdor bstan pa gsungs pa de bzhin glu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i bya ba mdor bstan pa gsungs pa de bzhin glu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The disciple's duties are stated in brief: Thus, with song and so on and so forth, which is easy to understand.

original: 'di dag thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las rtogs par bya'o //
translated: All this should be understood from the mandala rite.

original: de nas zhes bya ba bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rjes thogs su'o //
translated: Then, after the accumulation of merit,

original: rdo rje ni chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje ni chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: the vajra is the nature of the indivisibility of all dharmas.

original: de de'i bdag nyid du 'dzin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de de'i bdag nyid du 'dzin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who holds that as his own nature is so called.

original: de nyid ni bla na med pa nyid yin pas rgyal po nyid do zhes bya bas rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni bla na med pa nyid yin pas rgyal po nyid do zhes bya bas rgyal po'o //
translated: That is the unsurpassed, therefore it is the king.

original: aom zhes bya ba ni khas len pa ste ma skyes pa dang / rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid ni aom mo //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba ni khas len pa ste ma skyes pa dang / rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid ni aom mo //
translated: Om means acceptance, non-arising, abandonment of conceptualization, and illusion-like.

original: sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag gcig dang du ma nyid dang bral bas bdag med pa nyid do //
analyzed: sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag gcig dang du ma nyid dang bral bas bdag med pa nyid do //
translated: Sunyatā means all phenomena are devoid of self, because of being free from one and many.

original: @98a * // de'i ngo bo nyid ni bden pa'o //
analyzed: @98a * // de'i ngo bo nyid ni bden pa'o //
translated: Its nature is truth.

original: de nyid ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi dzny'a na'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi dzny'a na'o //
translated: That itself is the nature of realization, jñāna.

original: de nyid ni mi phyed cing gzhan 'byed pa'i phyir dang / bla na med pa'i phyir badzra'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mi phyed cing gzhan 'byed pa'i phyir dang / bla na med pa'i phyir badzra'o //
translated: That itself is vajra, because it is indivisible and divides others, and because it is unsurpassed.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo sva bh'a ba gang la yod pa de'i bdag nyid ni a'atma ko'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo sva bh'a ba gang la yod pa de'i bdag nyid ni a'atma ko'o //
translated: The nature of that is svabhāva, and that which has that nature is ātmaka.

original: de'i bdag nyid yin pas aa ham ste /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid yin pas aa ham ste /
translated: Because it has that nature, it is aham.

original: sh'u n+ya t'u dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: sh'u n+ya t'u dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bsdu ba'o //
translated: The summary is: Sunyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāva-ātmaka-aham.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i ngo bo zang zing med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i ngo bo zang zing med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
translated: It is a vajra because it is the nature of the Dharma, which is the unsurpassable nature of all the Tathagatas, and which is not material.

original: de'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de ni bdag ste aa ham zhes bya ba ni b'u dza badzre sva bh'a ba a'atpa ko ste ye shes kye 'khor lo bcug pa'i rjes thogs su bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de ni bdag ste aa ham zhes bya ba ni b'u dza badzre sva bh'a ba a'atpa ko ste ye shes kye 'khor lo bcug pa'i rjes thogs su bya ba'o //
translated: He whose nature is that is the self, which is expressed as “I am.”

original: khu ba yongs su gyur pas bzhengs nas srid pa dang zhi ba gnyis su med pa nyid kyis nga rgyal gsungs pa /
analyzed: khu ba yongs su gyur pas bzhengs nas srid pa dang zhi ba gnyis su med pa nyid kyis nga rgyal gsungs pa /
translated: Having arisen from the transformation of the semen, he declares the pride of the non-duality of existence and peace.

original: dharm'a dh'a tu ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dharm'a dh'a tu ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The dharmadhatu is the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: gang la rang bzhin yod pa de sva bh'a ba ste /
analyzed: gang la rang bzhin yod pa de sva bh'a ba ste /
translated: That which has an intrinsic nature is svabhava.

original: phyag dang zhal dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can ni a'atma ko& ham ngo //🔽da ni zhi ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sbyin sreg gi las rab 'byam gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: phyag dang zhal dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can ni a'atma ko& ham ngo // da ni zhi ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sbyin sreg gi las rab 'byam gsungs pa ste /
translated: The self is atma, which has the nature of hands, faces, and form.

original: zhi ba la sogs dbye ba yi //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs dbye ba yi //
translated: Now, beginning with “pacification, etc.,” he declares the extensive rite of the burnt offering.🔽The burnt offering is of three types,

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa dang rengs pa dang dbye ba dang bskrad pa dang mngon spyod kyi dbye bas so //🔽grub pa ste rdzogs par gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa dang rengs pa dang dbye ba dang bskrad pa dang mngon spyod kyi dbye bas so // grub pa ste rdzogs par gyur pa na'o //
translated: This is the division of pacifying, increasing, controlling, summoning, paralyzing, separating, expelling, and destroying.

original: yi zhes bya ba byung na'o //
analyzed: yi zhes bya ba byung na'o //
translated: When it is accomplished, that is, completed.🔽If it is not, then it is not.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /🔽las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa //
translated: For that very reason,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, “accomplishing all actions.”

original: zhi ba'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhi ba'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: With a peaceful mind,

original: dge ba'i sems kyis rnam par mig yengs pas so //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems kyis rnam par mig yengs pas so //
translated: with a virtuous mind, without distraction.🔽With an increasing mind,

original: rgyas pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni bu ram dang 'o ma za zhing ngo //🔽chags pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni bu ram dang 'o ma za zhing ngo // chags pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i sems kyis so //
translated: eating molasses and milk, with a desirous mind.🔽With a mind of anger,

original: la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni khros pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni khros pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis so //
translated: with a mind of anger, on a crossroad.

original: thab khung gsungs pa /
analyzed: thab khung gsungs pa /
translated: The hearth is stated:

original: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa ste //
analyzed: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa ste //
translated: The maṇḍala of pacifying is round,

original: zhes pa ni zlum pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zlum pa'o //
translated: round.🔽Like a pond,

original: rdzing bu 'dra zhes bya ba ni gru bzhi'o //
analyzed: rdzing bu 'dra zhes bya ba ni gru bzhi'o //
translated: square.

original: zla gam 'dra zhes bya ba ni gzhu lta bu'o //
analyzed: zla gam 'dra zhes bya ba ni gzhu lta bu'o //
translated: The crescent-like is like a bow.

original: nam mkha'i khams 'dra zhes bya ba ni gru gsum pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams 'dra zhes bya ba ni gru gsum pa'o //
translated: The space-like is triangular.

original: de dag gi rgya'i tshad gsungs pa /
analyzed: de dag gi rgya'i tshad gsungs pa /
translated: The size of their seals is stated:

original: khru gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: khru gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: One cubit, etc.

original: zabs su gsungs pa ni gting du khru phyed tshad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zabs su gsungs pa ni gting du khru phyed tshad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The depth is stated: half a cubit deep, etc.

original: sor lnga gnyis ni bcu'o //
analyzed: sor lnga gnyis ni bcu'o //
translated: Two times five finger-breadths is ten.

original: zhi ba la ni sor bzhi bor ba'i padma rgyas pa lta bu'i rnam pa sor bzhis @98b mtho ba'i kha khyer ro //
analyzed: zhi ba la ni sor bzhi bor ba'i padma rgyas pa lta bu'i rnam pa sor bzhis @98b mtho ba'i kha khyer ro //
translated: In the case of pacification, the rim is four finger-breadths high, like the shape of an open lotus, with four finger-breadths left out.

original: dkyil du ni sor brgyad pa bzhi'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dkyil du ni sor brgyad pa bzhi'i rdo rje'o //
translated: In the middle, the vajra is four finger-breadths on each side.

original: yam shing ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bstan to //
analyzed: yam shing ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bstan to //
translated: The sacrificial sticks are taught in the mandala ritual.

original: rgyas pa la ni sor brgyud bor ba'i kha khyer rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa la ni sor brgyud bor ba'i kha khyer rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
translated: In the case of prosperity, the rim is marked with a vajra, with ten finger-breadths left out.

original: dkyil du ni rdo rje snga ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: dkyil du ni rdo rje snga ma lta bu'o //
translated: In the middle, the vajra is as before.

original: zho dang sbrang rtsi dang sha kha ra dang / ma gong pa'i 'bras dang / sran ge'u dang / n+ya gro dha rlon pa'i yam shing sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: zho dang sbrang rtsi dang sha kha ra dang / ma gong pa'i 'bras dang / sran ge'u dang / n+ya gro dha rlon pa'i yam shing sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
translated: curd, honey, sugar, unhusked rice, beans, and green neem wood, twenty-four fingerbreadths long.

original: mngon spyod la ni nim pa dang / dug dang / da du ra dang / tsha ba'i mar dang / skye tshe dang / tsha ba rnams so //
analyzed: mngon spyod la ni nim pa dang / dug dang / da du ra dang / tsha ba'i mar dang / skye tshe dang / tsha ba rnams so //
translated: In the case of violent action, there are neem, poison, datura, hot ghee, mustard seed, and hot spices.

original: bskrad pa la ni khva'i sgro'o //
analyzed: bskrad pa la ni khva'i sgro'o //
translated: In the case of banishing, there is a crow's foot.

original: gang du sbyin sreg gi cho ga gsungs pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: gang du sbyin sreg gi cho ga gsungs pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: This is what is said in the case of the rite of homa.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o //
translated: This concludes the explanation of the eighth chapter in the Sri-Chakrasamvara-tantra-nama-panjikd composed by Acarya Sri-Dharasrl.

original: // da ni rgya mtsho'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas char dbab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: // da ni rgya mtsho'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas char dbab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa ni /
translated: Now, beginning with the words the ocean, the rite of rain-making is taught.

original: de la dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i rnal 'byor pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas rams kyi khu bas kham phor ma bsregs pa'i nang du /
analyzed: de la dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i rnal 'byor pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas rams kyi khu bas kham phor ma bsregs pa'i nang du /
translated: There, a yogin of Sri-Cakrasamvara, with firm resolve, in an unbaked clay pot, with the juice of neem wood,

original: ral gri'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la /
analyzed: ral gri'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la /
translated: One should draw an eight-spoked wheel of a sword, and on top of that, an eight-petaled lotus.

original: de'i steng du ku ru kulle'i sngags bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel bar bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ku ru kulle'i sngags bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel bar bri bar bya'o //
translated: On top of that, one should write the mantra of Kurukullā, along with the name of the person to be subdued.

original: de la dbyar zla tha chungs la karko tas so //
analyzed: de la dbyar zla tha chungs la karko tas so //
translated: In the last month of summer, [the nāga king] Kurukulla does it.

original: ston zla ra ba la sham ka p'a las so ;🔽/ ston zla 'bring po la taksha ka'o //
analyzed: ston zla ra ba la sham ka p'a las so ; / ston zla 'bring po la taksha ka'o //
translated: In the first month of autumn, Śaṅkhapāla does it.🔽In the middle month of autumn, Takṣaka does it.

original: ston zla tha chungs la ba su kyis so //
analyzed: ston zla tha chungs la ba su kyis so //
translated: In the last month of autumn, Vāsuki does it.

original: de dag nyid yang gdab nas dgun zla ra ba la sogs pa la char 'bebs so //
analyzed: de dag nyid yang gdab nas dgun zla ra ba la sogs pa la char 'bebs so //
translated: Those very [nāgas] again do it in the first month of winter, and so on.

original: de las gzhan pa'i kham phor ma bsregs pa dang kha sbyar du byas la /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i kham phor ma bsregs pa dang kha sbyar du byas la /
translated: One should make another unbaked clay pot, and join the two mouths together.

original: skud pa sngon pos bcings nas dor ku ru kulle 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyis bkug la yang dag par mchod de bkas bsgo la klu gnas pa'i mtsho la sogs par gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: skud pa sngon pos bcings nas dor ku ru kulle 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyis bkug la yang dag par mchod de bkas bsgo la klu gnas pa'i mtsho la sogs par gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Having bound it with a blue thread, one should summon the form of Kurukullā, who is to be recited, and having made offerings, one should give her orders and place it in a lake, and so on, where the nāgas dwell.

original: yang na ma si bishti ko ta bsten pa'i sngags kyi tshig bris la /
analyzed: yang na ma si bishti ko ta bsten pa'i sngags kyi tshig bris la /
translated: Or else, one should write the mantra syllables of the one who is attended by Maśi Viṣṭikotī.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: That completely transforms into

original: ku ru kulle klu thams cad skrag par byed pa bsgoms la yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: ku ru kulle klu thams cad skrag par byed pa bsgoms la yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Kurukullā, who terrifies all nāgas. Make offerings to her and

original: bcom ldan 'das ma bdag gi che ge mo'i dgos pa mdzod cig ces bka' bsgo nas klu'i gnas su gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma bdag gi che ge mo'i dgos pa mdzod cig ces bka' bsgo nas klu'i gnas su gzhug par bya'o //
translated: command her, “Blessed One, accomplish such and such a purpose of mine.” Then have her enter the abode of the nāgas.

original: de nas char dbab pa'i sa phyogs su 'dug la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dang yol ba la sogs pa thams cad sngon por byas la gdung ba'i khyad par @99a * //
analyzed: de nas char dbab pa'i sa phyogs su 'dug la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dang yol ba la sogs pa thams cad sngon por byas la gdung ba'i khyad par @99a * //
translated: Then, in a place where rain falls, all the parasols, banners, canopies, and curtains should be made blue.

original: thams cad dang ldan par rgyan sngon po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'od 'bar zhing gsal bar bris la de'i dbus su rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa sngon po'o //
analyzed: thams cad dang ldan par rgyan sngon po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'od 'bar zhing gsal bar bris la de'i dbus su rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa sngon po'o //
translated: The yogin, endowed with all the special features of the ritual, and with blue ornaments, should draw a blazing, bright, triangular fire maṇḍala. In the center of that, there is a blue wind maṇḍala, shaped like a bow, marked with pennants.

original: de'i dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor bum pa lta bu dkar po'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor bum pa lta bu dkar po'o //
translated: In the center of that, there is a white water maṇḍala, shaped like a vase.

original: de la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: de la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
translated: In that, there is an eight-petaled lotus.

original: de'i dkyil du chu bdag sprul dkar po bdun gyi gdengs ka yod pa /
analyzed: de'i dkyil du chu bdag sprul dkar po bdun gyi gdengs ka yod pa /
translated: In the middle of that is a white snake-like nāga with seven hoods.

original: skyes bu'i cha byad can lag pa g-yas na ral gri g-yon na klu'i zhags pa thogs pa'o //🔽shar gyi 'dab ma la dga' bo autpala sngon po ltar ljang ba /
analyzed: skyes bu'i cha byad can lag pa g-yas na ral gri g-yon na klu'i zhags pa thogs pa'o // shar gyi 'dab ma la dga' bo autpala sngon po ltar ljang ba /
translated: He has the form of a man, holding a sword in his right hand and a nāga noose in his left.🔽On the petal in the east is Nanda, green like a blue lotus.

original: lho yi 'dab ma la nor rgyas kyi bu dkar po //
analyzed: lho yi 'dab ma la nor rgyas kyi bu dkar po //
translated: On the petal in the south is Vāsuki, white.

original: nub kyi 'dab ma la taksha ka dmar po //

analyzed: 'gro ba de yi rang bzhin du //
translated: The nature of migrating beings

original: spros la rgyun mi 'chad snang bya //🔽brtan par khyab pa bde bzhi //
analyzed: spros la rgyun mi 'chad snang bya // brtan par khyab pa bde bzhi //
translated: appears uninterruptedly in emanation.🔽The state of the supreme stage

original: go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: is attained through the stability, pervasion, and bliss.

original: byang chub sems shor gyur na //
analyzed: byang chub sems shor gyur na //
translated: If the bodhicitta falls,

original: thob pa nyams 'gyur sems pa rgyal phyir //
analyzed: thob pa nyams 'gyur sems pa rgyal phyir //
translated: The loss of attainment is for the sake of the victory of the mind.

original: zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching.

original: rig ma 'du bya ba gsal bar gsungs pa //
analyzed: rig ma 'du bya ba gsal bar gsungs pa //
translated: The clear teaching of the rite of union with the consort:

original: phag mo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phag mo'i ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: phag mo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phag mo'i ni bshad zin to //
translated: The sow, etc. The sow has been explained.

original: nyid dang mtshungs pa'i shes rab po //
analyzed: nyid dang mtshungs pa'i shes rab po //
translated: The wisdom is similar to her.

original: de'i ngo bo gzung ba ni brtag pa ste bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo gzung ba ni brtag pa ste bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The nature of that is the object, the meditation, up to the end.

original: btsun mo kun la zhes bya ba ni rigs thams cad las byung ba'i btsun mo'o //
analyzed: btsun mo kun la zhes bya ba ni rigs thams cad las byung ba'i btsun mo'o //
translated: All queens means the queens arisen from all the clans.

original: 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'dod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'dod par bya ba'o //
translated: The desire is the object of desire.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this.

original: rigs lnga dang 'brel ba'i gang yang rung ba'i bu mo blangs la /
analyzed: rigs lnga dang 'brel ba'i gang yang rung ba'i bu mo blangs la /
translated: Having taken a girl connected with any of the five clans,

original: thos pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis 'dus byas pa nyid dang mtshungs par bskyed la /
analyzed: thos pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis 'dus byas pa nyid dang mtshungs par bskyed la /
translated: she is to be cultivated with the qualities of learning, etc.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi phyir 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi phyir 'dod par bya'o //
translated: She is to be desired for the sake of the attainment of the great seal.

original: de ltar rnam par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'jigs pa med par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'jigs pa med par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, the yogi/nī who is situated in this way is said to be fearless.

original: dpa' bos seng ge bzhin zhes bya ba la nyon mongs pa'i ri dags thams cad gsod par byed pas seng ge ste bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: dpa' bos seng ge bzhin zhes bya ba la nyon mongs pa'i ri dags thams cad gsod par byed pas seng ge ste bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The hero should act like a lion. The lion is the Lord, because he kills all the deer of the afflictions.

original: de bzhin du spyod pa bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du spyod pa bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should act like that.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: dpa' bos zhes bya ba la nyon mongs pa'i dgra ma lus pa las rgyal bas na dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: dpa' bos zhes bya ba la nyon mongs pa'i dgra ma lus pa las rgyal bas na dpa' bo'o //
translated: The hero, because he is victorious over all the enemies of the afflictions.

original: 'dod pa'i don kun rab tu sgrub //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun rab tu sgrub // ces bya ba la /
translated: He accomplishes all desired aims.

original: 'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa ste gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
analyzed: 'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa ste gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
translated: Here, the desired aims are the objects of form, etc.

original: thams cad kyang yin la 'dod pa yang pas 'od dpa'i don kun no /
analyzed: thams cad kyang yin la 'dod pa yang pas 'od dpa'i don kun no /
translated: All and desired aims are all desired aims.

original: des don yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can sgrub par byed pas 'dod pa'i don kun rab sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: des don yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can sgrub par byed pas 'dod pa'i don kun rab sgrub pa'o //
translated: He accomplishes the aim, which is the nature of perfect complete enlightenment. Thus, he accomplishes all desired aims.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i rol mo ma lus pas rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa bsgrub par ba'o zhes ba'o //🔽da ni snying rjes gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis sgrub pa'i thabs kyi khyad par gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i rol mo ma lus pas rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa bsgrub par ba'o zhes ba'o // da ni snying rjes gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis sgrub pa'i thabs kyi khyad par gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: One should practice the conduct of awareness with all the enjoyments of the five sense objects.🔽Now, out of compassion, he teaches another special method of practice, in accordance with the inclinations of those to be trained.

original: de nas da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la srung ba dang gur gyi rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: de nas da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la srung ba dang gur gyi rjes thogs su'o //
translated: Then, now, etc.

original: gang la phyag rgya yod pa de ni phyag rgya ste /🔽de'i sgrub @106a * //
analyzed: gang la phyag rgya yod pa de ni phyag rgya ste / de'i sgrub @106a * //
translated: One who has a seal is a seal-holder.

original: pa'i thabs bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: pa'i thabs bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The method of his practice should be explained.

original: gsang sngags chen po'i yi ge gcig / ces bya ba ni hr'i: shtri: nyid de bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi sa bon no //
analyzed: gsang sngags chen po'i yi ge gcig / ces bya ba ni hr'i: shtri: nyid de bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi sa bon no //
translated: The single syllable of the great mantra is HRĪḤ, which is the seed syllable that is the cause of generation.

original: de nyid ni bzlas pa yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de nyid ni bzlas pa yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: That itself is the recitation.

original: ma he yang dag bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ma he yang dag bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the bull.

original: zhes bya ba la gang la ma he lta bu'i gdong yod pa de ni ma he'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gang la ma he lta bu'i gdong yod pa de ni ma he'o //
translated: One who has a face like a bull is a bull.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gur gyi khongs su chud pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gur gyi khongs su chud pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The “vajra maṇḍala” is the maṇḍala included in the Vajra Tent.

original: bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i gzugs nyid yin pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te de la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i gzugs nyid yin pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te de la gnas pa'o //
translated: Since he is the very form of the wrathful Bhagavān, he is on a sun maṇḍala.

original: ma he'i steng du zhes bya ba ni ma he'i rgyab kyi steng du'o //
analyzed: ma he'i steng du zhes bya ba ni ma he'i rgyab kyi steng du'o //
translated: “On the back of a buffalo” means on the back of a buffalo.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is as follows.

original: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i stong pa nyid dang / srung ba dang gur gyi nang du shtri: yongs su gyur pa las phyag brgya pa ma he'i zhal can /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i stong pa nyid dang / srung ba dang gur gyi nang du shtri: yongs su gyur pa las phyag brgya pa ma he'i zhal can /
translated: Having first confessed one’s sins and so on, one should visualize oneself as Yama, with a hundred arms, having the face of a buffalo, arisen from the transformation of the HŪṀ syllable, in the center of an empty, protected, and guarded maṇḍala.

original: ma he'i steng du gshin rje mnan pa dpag tu med pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro ba /
analyzed: ma he'i steng du gshin rje mnan pa dpag tu med pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro ba /
translated: He is seated on a buffalo, trampling on Yama, radiating immeasurable light rays.

original: g-yon brkyang pa khro bo'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang pa khro bo'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He is standing with his left leg straight, adorned with all the ornaments of a wrathful one.

original: phyag gi gtso bo gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag gi gtso bo gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa /
translated: The two principal hands hold a flaying knife and skull cup.

original: phyag lhag ma rnams na rdo rje dang ral gri la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa zhes bya bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyag lhag ma rnams na rdo rje dang ral gri la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa zhes bya bar gsungs pa /
translated: The remaining hands hold various weapons such as a vajra and sword.

original: gang yang cung zhig gcod cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gang yang cung zhig gcod cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: It is said, Whatever is cut, etc.

original: blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The wise is endowed with nondual great bliss.🔽 Then, from there, etc., it is said, Then, I will explain the ritual action of Yamântaka, etc.

original: de las gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs gsungs pa la yang gzhan thams cad ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs gsungs pa la yang gzhan thams cad ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: All the rest is the same as before.

original: 'on kyang yi ge hr'i: las rdzogs pa thal pas byugs pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang yi ge hr'i: las rdzogs pa thal pas byugs pa /
translated: However, from the syllable HRĪḤ, he is anointed with ashes.

original: phyag 'bum phrag gnyis mnga' ba'o //🔽de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
analyzed: phyag 'bum phrag gnyis mnga' ba'o // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
translated: He has two hundred thousand arms.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal can gyi gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal can gyi gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs gsungs pa ste /
translated: Then, I will explain the ritual action of Yamântaka with a wrathful face.

original: yang gzhan thams cad ni snga ma dang 'dra'o//
analyzed: yang gzhan thams cad ni snga ma dang 'dra'o//
translated: All the rest is the same as before.

original: hr'um las bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: hr'um las bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: The generated from hrīḥ is the distinction.

original: sngar gshin rje gshed gnyis kyi bzlas pa'i sngags yi ge shtri: gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: sngar gshin rje gshed gnyis kyi bzlas pa'i sngags yi ge shtri: gcig pa nyid do //
translated: The mantra for the recitation of the two Yamāntakas is the single syllable ṣṭṛī.

original: de nyid zhal rnam par 'gyur ba 'di yang de rang nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nyid zhal rnam par 'gyur ba 'di yang de rang nyid yin no //
translated: That itself is the transformation of the face.

original: da ni rnal 'byor pa'i bza' ba dang mi bza' ba'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang sngags @106b kyis dub na rgyas par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa /🔽dam tshig sgrub thabs bshad par bya //
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor pa'i bza' ba dang mi bza' ba'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang sngags @106b kyis dub na rgyas par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa / dam tshig sgrub thabs bshad par bya //
translated: Now, in order to abandon the yogi's conceptualization of what to eat and what not to eat, and in order to expand the mind when tired of mantra, the means of accomplishing the pledge is taught.

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽dam tshig 'dis rnam par mi rtog pa dang mnyam par byed cing thob par byed pas dam tshig gam /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / dam tshig 'dis rnam par mi rtog pa dang mnyam par byed cing thob par byed pas dam tshig gam /
translated: The means of accomplishing the pledge is explained.🔽By this pledge, one becomes nonconceptual and attains, thus it is a pledge;

original: rnal 'byor pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig ste de'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig ste de'i sgrub thabs so //
translated: or, since it is not to be transgressed by the yogi, it is a pledge, and this is the means of accomplishing it.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis dgos pa thams cad sgrub pas de'i phyir dgos pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis dgos pa thams cad sgrub pas de'i phyir dgos pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: Since non-conceptuality accomplishes all goals, therefore it is said, “all goals,” and so on.

original: 'di ni sems can la gnod pa med pas bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni ngan pa dang bral zhes bya ba ste dpyas pa dang bral ba ni ngan pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni sems can la gnod pa med pas bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni ngan pa dang bral zhes bya ba ste dpyas pa dang bral ba ni ngan pa dang bral ba ste /
translated: Here, one should do it without harming sentient beings. “ Free from evil” means free from blame.

original: srog chags la gnod pa dang bral bas ngan pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: srog chags la gnod pa dang bral bas ngan pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Free from harming living beings is free from evil.

original: rnyed dka' min zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyis bor ba nyid do //
analyzed: rnyed dka' min zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyis bor ba nyid do //
translated: “ Not difficult to obtain” means just discarded by everyone.

original: sha chen dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //🔽snum chen gyis zhes bya ba ni mdung la bskyon pa 'am mtshon gyis phug pa 'am /
analyzed: sha chen dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o // snum chen gyis zhes bya ba ni mdung la bskyon pa 'am mtshon gyis phug pa 'am /
translated: “ Human flesh” and so on are easy to understand.

original: shing la btags pa'i mi'i tshil gyis so //
analyzed: shing la btags pa'i mi'i tshil gyis so //
translated: “ With great oil” means with the fat of a man impaled on a stake or wounded by a weapon.

original: rams dang bsres pa'i zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rams dang bsres pa'i zhes bya ba la /
translated: “ Mixed with lac” means mixed with lac.🔽“ One should rotate them equally” means

original: de dag mnyam par bskor bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag mnyam par bskor bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: one should rotate them equally.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir gsungs pa dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is the result of that? Therefore it is said, “one becomes powerful, etc. ”

original: gzhan yang sbyor ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, the application is stated:

original: snang mdzad ni bee ro tsa na'o //
analyzed: snang mdzad ni bee ro tsa na'o //
translated: Vairocana is Vairocana.

original: sindu ba ra ni sindu ba ra'i lo ma'o //
analyzed: sindu ba ra ni sindu ba ra'i lo ma'o //
translated: Sindhuvara is Sindhuvara leaf.

original: bil ba ni dpal 'bras so //
analyzed: bil ba ni dpal 'bras so //
translated: Bilva is the fruit of the bilva tree.

original: so phag phye ma bsres pa dang // zhes bya ba la rtag pa la sogs pa dang mnyam pa'i so phag gi phye ma'o //
analyzed: so phag phye ma bsres pa dang // zhes bya ba la rtag pa la sogs pa dang mnyam pa'i so phag gi phye ma'o //
translated: The powder of bricks mixed with the powder of bricks, etc. , is the powder of bricks equal to the eternal, etc.

original: gser shing lo ma'i khu ba rnams //
analyzed: gser shing lo ma'i khu ba rnams //
translated: The juice of the leaves of the golden tree

original: zhes bya ba ni da du ra'i le ma'i khu ba dang btags la bsre bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni da du ra'i le ma'i khu ba dang btags la bsre bar bya'o //
translated: is the juice of the leaves of the date tree.

original: 'di yi zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: 'di yi zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: sbyor ba gzhan yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan yang gsungs pa /
translated: Another application is stated:

original: gci ba chen po zhes bya ba la gci ba chen po ni gcin no //
analyzed: gci ba chen po zhes bya ba la gci ba chen po ni gcin no //
translated: Great excrement is urine.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Vajra amṛta is bodhicitta.

original: 'di dag mnyam par rtag tu btung bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di dag mnyam par rtag tu btung bar bya ste /
translated: These two should always be drunk together.

original: dbugs rgyu ba'i sna'i khung bu nas so //
analyzed: dbugs rgyu ba'i sna'i khung bu nas so //
translated: Through the nostrils, the passage of breath.

original: re res kyang rgas pa dang shi ba spang bar 'gyur ro zhes shes par byas la /
analyzed: re res kyang rgas pa dang shi ba spang bar 'gyur ro zhes shes par byas la /
translated: One should understand that each of them will abandon old age and death.

original: 'chi ba'i tshe 'phral gyi rdo rje'i bdud rtsi sna gnyis kyi sbubs nas phus btab la blugs na yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i tshe 'phral gyi rdo rje'i bdud rtsi sna gnyis kyi sbubs nas phus btab la blugs na yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At the time of death, if one inhales the nectar of the vajra through the two nostrils, one will live again.

original: sbyor ba 'di'i phan yon gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di'i phan yon gsungs pa ni /
translated: The benefits of this practice are stated:

original: 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog @107a * //
analyzed: 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog @107a * //
translated: This is the supreme yoga,

original: gtso bos // zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bos // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the chief one.

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How so? It is stated:

original: rang byung me tog btung ba bzhin //
analyzed: rang byung me tog btung ba bzhin //
translated: Like drinking the self-arisen flower.

original: zhes bya ba ste rang byung gi me tog ni bud med kyi dang po'i me tog go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste rang byung gi me tog ni bud med kyi dang po'i me tog go //
translated: The self-arisen flower is the first flower of a woman.

original: bstan pa'i cho gas 'thungs na 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro zhes grags te /
analyzed: bstan pa'i cho gas 'thungs na 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro zhes grags te /
translated: It is well-known that if one drinks it according to the prescribed ritual, one will not die.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de yang nag mo yi ni ma ra ngo blang //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to // de yang nag mo yi ni ma ra ngo blang //
translated: The meaning is that it is like that.

original: dkar po yi ni yar ngo blang //
analyzed: dkar po yi ni yar ngo blang //
translated: Moreover, one should take the dark fortnight of the black [fortnight],🔽and the bright fortnight of the white [fortnight].

original: zhes bya ba yin la sngo bsangs dang / dkar bsangs ni de dag gi khongs su gtogs so zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin la sngo bsangs dang / dkar bsangs ni de dag gi khongs su gtogs so zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: The terms dark blue and light blue are included in those, according to the instruction.

original: gang du spyod par ston par byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang du spyod par ston par byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called where one practices because it is taught to be where one practices.

original: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim pa phye ba bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim pa phye ba bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the eleventh chapter in the Sri-Krsnayamari-tantra-panjika, composed by Acarya Sri-Dharasrl.

original: // / da ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsgrub pa'i mchod pa glus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsgrub pa'i mchod pa glus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to complete the offering of practice with a song, he says, beginning with the five objects of desire, and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, and so on.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: The Blessed One has been explained.

original: sems kyi phung po chen po'i don mdzad pa'i byams pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir chen po'o //
analyzed: sems kyi phung po chen po'i don mdzad pa'i byams pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir chen po'o //
translated: It is great because it is the nature of love, which accomplishes the great purpose of the aggregate of mind.

original: 'di ni chen po yang yin zhing skyes bu yang yin pas skyes bu chen po ste /
analyzed: 'di ni chen po yang yin zhing skyes bu yang yin pas skyes bu chen po ste /
translated: It is great and it is a person, so it is a great person.

original: gang phyir pho brang 'gengs byed pa //
analyzed: gang phyir pho brang 'gengs byed pa //
translated: Because it fills the palace,

original: de'i phyir skyes bu zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir skyes bu zhes brjod do //
translated: therefore it is called the Person.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis skyes bu ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ngo bo ma lus pa'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor gyi pho brang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'gengs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis skyes bu ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ngo bo ma lus pa'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor gyi pho brang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'gengs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By this verse, the Person is the essence of the Buddha-field, because it fills the palace of the supporting mandala.

original: snying rje'i dbang gis 'da' bar mi bya ba'i phyir dam tshig go /
analyzed: snying rje'i dbang gis 'da' bar mi bya ba'i phyir dam tshig go /
translated: It is a pledge because it is not to be transgressed by the power of compassion.

original: rtsa rtsi ka'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba la de'i rnam par sems rtse gcig par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtsa rtsi ka'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba la de'i rnam par sems rtse gcig par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the samadhi of the form of Vajravetali means having made the mind one-pointed in that form.

original: phag mo'i rnam pa lta bu yi //
analyzed: phag mo'i rnam pa lta bu yi //
translated: The form of Vajravarahi means having the form of a sow.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di dag ces bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: These refers to the following.

original: mchod pa'i glu zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: mchod pa'i glu zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The song of praise is the nature of the manifestation of the unsurpassed reality.

original: brjod par mdzad do zhes bya ba ni gsung ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: brjod par mdzad do zhes bya ba ni gsung ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is said means it is endowed with speech.

original: aa kye kye zhes pa ni yul ra da'i 'bod skad do //
analyzed: aa kye kye zhes pa ni yul ra da'i 'bod skad do //
translated: The exclamation Alas! Alas! is the cry of the Rāvaṇa realm.

original: yang bla na med pa'i sku gsum gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir aa kye kya zhes bod pa'o //
analyzed: yang bla na med pa'i sku gsum gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir aa kye kya zhes bod pa'o //
translated: Again, it is said Alas! Alas! because it is the very essence of the unsurpassed three bodies.

original: gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba ni de nyid bod pa ste /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba ni de nyid bod pa ste /
translated: The one called Black Yamāri is addressed by that name.

original: 'di'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of this has been explained.

original: bla ma @107b bya ba ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: bla ma @107b bya ba ni bla ma'o //
translated: The one called guru is the guru.

original: srin po'i gzugs can rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: srin po'i gzugs can rang bzhin khyod //
translated: You who have the nature of a rākṣasa form.

original: ces bya ba ni srin po'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni srin po'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The one who has the nature of a rākṣasa form.

original: gdug pa can rnams 'jigs par byed pas srin po'i gzugs so //
analyzed: gdug pa can rnams 'jigs par byed pas srin po'i gzugs so //
translated: The rākṣasa form is for terrifying the wicked.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus par zad par byed pa'i phyir rang bzhin khyod ces bya ba ni srin po'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin no //🔽bdag gis zhes bya ba ni byams pa bdag gis so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus par zad par byed pa'i phyir rang bzhin khyod ces bya ba ni srin po'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin no // bdag gis zhes bya ba ni byams pa bdag gis so //
translated: The nature is you because it completely destroys the conceptual thoughts of afflictions. The nature is the nature of the rākṣasa form.

original: khyod ces bya ba ni khyod nyid do //
analyzed: khyod ces bya ba ni khyod nyid do //
translated: The one called I is Maitreya. You is you yourself.

original: mthong na zhes bya ba ni bltas na zhes bya ba ste mthong bar gyur na zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: mthong na zhes bya ba ni bltas na zhes bya ba ste mthong bar gyur na zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: “If seen” means if looked at, up to if beheld.

original: shin tu 'jigs zhes bya ba ni skrag par gyur pa ste zhi ba nyid yin na yang 'di lta bu'i rnam par gnas par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu 'jigs zhes bya ba ni skrag par gyur pa ste zhi ba nyid yin na yang 'di lta bu'i rnam par gnas par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Very frightening” means terrifying, because even though he is peaceful, he is situated in such a form.

original: 'di thong mdzod ces bya ba ni yongs su thong mdzod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di thong mdzod ces bya ba ni yongs su thong mdzod ces bya ba'o //
translated: “Give it up” means give it up completely.

original: khros pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: khros pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i ngo bo ste /
translated: “Wrathful nature” means the essence of wrath.

original: zhi ba dang bar mar gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams la yang so sor de'i ngo bor mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhi ba dang bar mar gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams la yang so sor de'i ngo bor mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he assumes that form individually for disciples who are situated in peace and the middle way.

original: snying rje'i glu gsungs pa /
analyzed: snying rje'i glu gsungs pa /

original: khyed kyi zhes bya ba ni khyod nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: khyed kyi zhes bya ba ni khyod nyid kyi'o //

original: gar gyis zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gar byas pa na'o //
analyzed: gar gyis zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gar byas pa na'o //
translated: “By your dance” means by your performance of the unsurpassed Buddha dance.

original: g-yos par zhes bya ba ni 'dar bar ro //
analyzed: g-yos par zhes bya ba ni 'dar bar ro //
translated: “Shaken” means trembled.

original: mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og bcas //
analyzed: mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og bcas //

original: zhes bya ba ni sa bla sa stengs sa 'og rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa bla sa stengs sa 'og rnams so //
translated: The three worlds are the upper, the middle, and the lower.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

analyzed: khyod kyis gar mdzad pas srid pa gsum g-yos par 'gyur gyis ngo bo de thong mdzod la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su mdzod cig ces bya ba'o //

original: nag po ni rnam par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nag po ni rnam par 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: aanydza na bcag pa 'dra zhes bya ba la bcag pa ni mig sman gyi 'de gu ste aanydza na bcag pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba'o //

analyzed: khro zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa la khros pa'i yid can no //

analyzed: khri tsam gyis zhes bya'o //

original: 'byung po rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma'i //

translated: “Of the bhūtas and the ḍākinīs”

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i don gyi drug pa'o //

original: 'chi @108b zhes bya ba ni tshar gcod pa'o //

translated: “Kill” means to destroy.

original: de la gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas la 'byung po la sogs pas gzung bar shes par byas nas de la de bkug nas bsgrub bya'i lus la gzhug cing bcings la sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan nas /
