analyzed: ral gcig ma'i sngags bzlas na zhag bdun gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: or the mantra of Ekâgra. If one recites for seven days, she will certainly be accomplished.

original: gdug pa can tshar bcad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gdug pa can tshar bcad pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to destroy the wicked,

original: spos byed ma'i sgrub thabs gsungs pa /🔽de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
analyzed: spos byed ma'i sgrub thabs gsungs pa / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
translated: the sadhana of Dhûpâ is taught.🔽Then, I will explain

original: zhes @114b bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes @114b bya ba la /
translated: the sadhana of Dhûpâ.

original: 'jig rten gsum la 'tshe nus pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum la 'tshe nus pa //
translated: He is able to harm the three worlds.

original: zhes bya ba ni sbos par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sbos par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the protection.

original: 'di yang snga ma bzhin du srung ba dang gur gyi nang du'o //
analyzed: 'di yang snga ma bzhin du srung ba dang gur gyi nang du'o //
translated: And this is also like the previous one, within the protection circle.

original: sku mdog ser po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: sku mdog ser po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The yellow-colored body, etc. , are easy to understand.

original: pu'i sa bon las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: pu'i sa bon las shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know from the seed of pu.

analyzed: pu ka s'i'i las zhes bya ba la de'i las ni 'di yin te /
translated: The rite of Pukkasi is as follows:

analyzed: lce la dza dmar po bkod la de'i 'o kyis bsgrub bya'i snying gar kham dkar po bsgoms nas /

analyzed: snying la sogs pa thams cad bkug la rang gi ltor bcug par bsams na bstan pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //

original: tho ba rgyas pa mda' dag ces bya pa la /
analyzed: tho ba rgyas pa mda' dag ces bya pa la /
translated: The hammer is expanded, the arrow is sharp.

analyzed: gang gi kha gyes pa'i tho pa ni tho ba rgyas pa ste de dang bcas pa'i mda' rna ba'i bar du bkang bas 'bigs pa'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: The hammer that is expanded between the lips is the hammer that is expanded. The arrow that is filled up to the ear with that is piercing. This is the instruction.

original: phyag bzhi bong bu la bcings pa //
analyzed: phyag bzhi bong bu la bcings pa //
translated: Four-armed, bound to a donkey.

original: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: For the purpose of invisibility,

analyzed: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa gsungs pa la /
translated: the practice of Manjushri is taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then and so forth.

original: 'dir yang yang dag bshad par bya //
analyzed: 'dir yang yang dag bshad par bya //
translated: Here also, I will explain properly

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //

analyzed: de'i mod la zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i skad cig la zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

analyzed: 'dir ni phyag mtshan ma bstan te /

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa'i phyag mtshan yin no //

analyzed: phyag gshan dag na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //

analyzed: sngon po dang dkar po ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal lo //

analyzed: shar du mdzes ma zhes bya la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
translated: In the east, Sundarī, and so on, as before.

analyzed: gti mug la sogs pa'i kha dog dang phyag mtshan dgod do //
translated: One should place the colors and implements of delusion, and so on.

original: 'khor lo la sogs zhes bya ba yang de nyid ltar ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo la sogs zhes bya ba yang de nyid ltar ro //
translated: The wheel, and so on, is just like that.

original: 'di'i khyad par gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: 'di'i khyad par gsungs pa ni //
translated: The special feature of this is stated:

original: sa bon yi ge mam las byung //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sa bon yi ge mam las byung // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Arisen from the seed syllable maṃ.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this.

analyzed: yi ge mam las bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa na thams cad kyang bskyed par bya'o //
translated: When the Bhagavān is generated from the syllable maṃ, all should be generated.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus na bzhugs //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus na bzhugs //
translated: Residing in the center of the maṇḍala

analyzed: zhes bya pa ni dbus nyid du ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o // thams cad g-yon @115a * //
translated: means residing in the center of the maṇḍala of the essence, which is beautified by eight pillars.

original: brkyang ba kho na'o //
analyzed: brkyang ba kho na'o //
translated: All are standing with the left leg straight.

original: sngon gyi 'khor lo las gdan gyi khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi 'khor lo las gdan gyi khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: The special feature of the seat is stated in the previous maṇḍala:

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas //
translated: The moon maṇḍala is perfectly situated.

original: zhes bya'o // phyi'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // phyi'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa gsungs pa /
translated: The arrangement of the outer maṇḍala is stated:
